description: Lunafaqt is an app to render the moon on any specific date and or location. It also calculates the rise and set times for the sun and moon, twilight times, time and date for the next moon phase. If you have an issue, please contact me by emailing me at lunafaqt@gmail.com and i will do everything i can to resolve your issue. Features: - Draws the current phase of the moon with parallactic angle - Swipe left/right to increase/decrease the date by a day - Two homescreen widgets with moon image and rise/set times - Adjustable widget transparency - Location based on GPS or manual coordinates - Coordinate lookup by address, city name, postal code or landmark - Adjustable date and time in 12/24 hour format - Sun rise, set and twilight times for the given location - Moon rise, set and transit times for the given location - Percentage of the moon's visible disk illuminated - Current moon altitude and azimuth in degrees - Moon age and distance to Earth - Current zodiac sign the moon is in - Date and times of the next major phases - Lunar calendar wich shows the phases for one month with indications of the major phases, swipe left/right to change the month - Supports installation to SD card (Note: if installed to SD card, the widgets won't work! This is not a bug but an Android issue. See: http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=8555 ) - Language support for English, Dutch, German, French, Italian, Russian, Czech and Spanish - Ad supported (can be removed with an in-app purchase)

description: With Caddy's Electronic Patient Health & Medical Records system (EMR), you can manage and share your patient list as well as patient tasks, notes, medications, records, images, and messages anywhere, anytime. Key features: - Share patient records securely within your healthcare team. - Take medical images of patient wounds and skin rashes. - Manage patient tasks list and assign jobs to healthcare members in your medical team. - Offline access to 125 medical calculators - Records patient problems, family history, and clinical alerts. - Add medications to easily track what your patients are taking. Medical tasks and messaging: - Use the quick tick box list for selecting medical tasks. - Customize the tick box list so you can quickly record patient tasks on ward rounds - Assign tasks within your medical team so everyone knows their plan for the day - Send comments and messages about specific tasks securely and easily. Help is always on hand - Add images to the patient's record and share them with your team Medical notes (EMR) - Records a patient's visit to your health clinic - Never miss an opportunity on ward rounds to write medical notes again Patient list: - Quickly review your patient list - Always know where your patient is located by updating ward and room information - Note demographic information such as date of birth and ethnicity. Other features include: Health & Medical Calculator: - Over 125 medical calculators - Each medical calculator offers healthcare recommendations - Fully referenced calculators - Health & Medical Calculators are constantly updated Drug Reference: - Powered by FDA drug database - Provides drug mechanism of action, drug indications, drug contraindications, physiological effects, and drug interactions Health News: - News from over 10 different health journals and news websites - Stay up to date with the latest trends and clinical breakthroughs - Healthcare news is automatically updated There are now over 500 reviews for Caddy, and while we started out as just a health & medical calculator, we have the goal to create an advanced healthcare record to help clinicians and patients around the world. Want to be involved? E-mail Caddy support. Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CaddyMed

description: AlMosaly is an Islamic prayer reminder app; it's the most important Islamic app for all Muslims all around the world. As it has a very accurate prayer times, Qibla, Fasting, Day – night & prayer' Azkar, Ramadan Emsakia, Calendar and Quran. AlMosaly has two unique features which called "Silent mode during prayer" and" Mosques "which is showing the nearest mosques to your location with a very accurate GBS. Features: 1- Shows prayer times daily or for a whole week with any date you specify. 2- Shows Qibla direction with respect to: North, Sun and Moon direction. 3- GPS is supported to get prayer times or Qibla direction wherever you are. 4- Hijri (Arabic) Calendar and its corresponding Gregorian calendar 5- Ramadan Emsakeya(fajr and sunset) times 6- Quran share alerts, and saving your last read position. 7- Each prayer has its own alerts that you can adjust as you like: Alert for Azan time, before prayer times,and for iqama time . 8- AlMosaly also alerts you for other islamic activities like: evening prayers (qiyam), Duha prayer, Azkar, fasting, Friday alerts, and more activates which important to Islam. 9- You can select your location among thousands of cities all over the world, or you can add your custom location using GPS. 10- We offer "Mosques" screen where you find near mosques to you location on the map with routes to them. 11- On the application main screen we show selected videos for Mecca, Kaaba and Madina views. Keywords: Adhan, Allah, Compass, Mosque, Muslim, athan, hadith, tasbih, alarm, fajr, sahoor, full, book; search, year, dawn, round, calculator, translation, clock, season.

description: Notice !!!!- You must download adobe reader for your device. If you do not download adobe reader than you will not be able to see most of the documents. Teacher Review "As Science teacher, I find many obstacles in finding the perfect medium in which to share information with my students. This often includes hours of google searches, you tube searches, etc. This app is amazing! It takes those hours I used to spend and turns them into seconds with one touch of this app. I love it! Thanks again for creating such an awesome app that gives me hours of my life back! " In the information age of today education, learning and teaching is changing fast. The technology that is being used in and outside of the classroom is everywhere. Almost every student has a cell phone with access to the Internet. Even with out Internet access there are educational applications for iPhone, iPad and so on. The methods for teaching students and special needs students are expanding. Some schools are going all iPad. Meaning all students will have iPads with digital textbooks and new learning tools. For students these types of applications can be very useful. The student who cannot focus on one type of learning at a time can flip back and fourth through the app to stay focused. The student who is an extremely visual learner will be attracted to the devices colorful screen of pictures in the lesson. The student who has trouble writing notes or preparing them self for a test can simply open up previous lessons and practice on the interactive quizzes of the apps. The student who is a auditory learner can listen to nature sounds while reviewing topics or watch videos related to each topic. The very high performing student can find interesting topic related daily news and summarize it for the class. All of these options can be utilized through one educational app. MS Life Science Buddy is the ultimate tool for learning Biology. This app was designed by a teacher who has used all possible multimedia resources in the classroom for teaching regents curriculum. MS Life Science Buddy is not only an app for learning Biology and living environment but also a app for teachers. The features of this app makes studying extremely convenient. The features of this app include everything you need to prepare for middle school biology. 1. This app includes attractive lessons on all topics below. 2. interactive Fun quizzes by topic (with real regents questions) 3. Daily Biology and science news updates. 4. Sharing through email 5. Fun videos from youtube. 6. Flash cards by topic. This app would be ideal for classrooms with iPads because it has the resources to prepare for a middle school life science or to present a lesson. All the buddy apps are available on the app store and have been helping teachers and students since their release.

description: You have weak cellular signal on your mobile phone and calls and 3G are constantly interrupted? This new effective application will help to improve GSM, 3G, 4G and LTE signals on your mobile phone/tablet. **The application won't work on Android version 4.2 and on later Android versions because of some restrictions** Characteristics: - improve GSM, 3G, 4G, LTE signal reception on your mobile phone/tablet - instantly improve calls and internet connections - improve speed of downloading and data transmission - prolong battery life - find the strongest signal from the base mobile station within coverage area - this application is a guaranteed way to find out the reason of weak signal on your mobile phone. If cellular signal is weak because you mobile phone gets always connected to the wrong mobile station, this application will exactly help you. - if the signal is low because of poor coverage in the surrounding area, you may need special appliances for signal improvement. The way the application works: You should click "Improve the signal" and application will do the rest for you. Application finds the strongest mobile signal within the coverage area and get connected to the nearest base station. Due to reconnection to the nearest base station mobile signal level will incease on your mobile phone/tablet. Please, write us if you have some some comments or suggestions.

description: DOWNLOAD AND SAVE! Save an extra $25 on select hotels on your first app booking when you use promo code DOWNLOAD25. Just book by 6/30/15 and travel by 9/30/15 for 2 nights or longer. *See full terms at: http://www.orbitz.com/mobile . ***** "Best Travel App" -- 2014 APPY Awards Orbitz is the #1 way to book travel on your mobile device. Designed for Android phones and tablets, the Orbitz app lets you quickly and easily search and book hotel rooms (including last-minute bookings and mobile-only deals up to 50% off), flights, and rental cars without leaving the app. Plus, join Orbitz Rewards and start earning extra Orbucks when you book on the app for flight (2%) and hotel (5%) that you can instantly redeem on hotels! You can also view booked itineraries, check for flight delays during travel, and get trip reminders via Google Now. Orbitz offers a simple, secure booking process, a Best Price Guarantee, and 24x7 customer support. UNRIVALED SPEED & EASE OF USE: Search and book flights, hotels, and rental cars without leaving the app. Use convenient features like Google+ or Facebook sign-in plus Google Wallet to book in a flash. GREAT DEALS, EVEN AT THE LAST-MINUTE: Ability to book last-minute, including convenient "nearby tonight" option for hotels. Plus, take advantage of new app-only deals all the time: Exclusive savings off our best hotels! FABULOUS REWARDS PROGRAM: Join Orbitz Rewards and earn Orbucks on your flight (1%) and hotel (5%) bookings that you can instantly redeem on hotels in the app! USEFUL HOTEL INFORMATION: See hotels plotted on a map, swipe through photo galleries, and read comprehensive reviews from travelers. CONVENIENT TRAVEL TOOLS: View your itineraries 24x7 – even offline. Get info on flight delays and gate changes, plus directions to your hotel. And when you book with a Gmail address, you'll get flight status, hotel check-in, and rental car pick-up reminders on day of travel if you use Google Now (Android v4.1+ Jellybean users). TRUSTED NAME: Enjoy a secure booking process, 24x7 customer service, no Orbitz fees on hotel cancellations or changes, plus our Best Price Guarantee: Orbitz customers who find their same prepaid hotel room, flight, or car for a lower price online may receive rewards equal to price difference + bonus of up to $200 to be used on a future hotel booking. APP PERMISSIONS ---------------------- • Device & app history: The app uses this to manage its own tasks and offer an improved experience when you switch between different sections of the app. • Identity: The app uses this so that Google+ users can sign in to their account on the app. • Location: The app uses this to allow you to search for hotels, airports, and other places near your current location. • Photos/Media/Files: The app uses this to display Google Maps. For example, you can toggle to a map-based view of hotel search results within the app.
release_text: Tablet user? See both a list of hotels and hotels plotted on a map in dual panes on the same screen. And when you tap on a hotel, you can see the list of hotels and the details of the selected hotel on the same screen, too. Checking out a particular hotel? Whether on your phone or tablet, now enjoy larger hotel photos and more organized content – plus, the map showing the hotel’s location is no longer a tap away. And, of course, more "spring cleaning" throughout the app!

description: Welcome to the Overstock Shopping App. Find brand-name products at up to 70% off when you use the Overstock shopping app on your Android device to browse, search, and purchase all of the great products on the Overstock.com website. • Shop sales, daily deals, and weekly promotions wherever you are in the U.S. • Receive notifications for exclusive coupons and daily deals • Find the biggest discounts on brand-names at up to 70% off MSRP • Check out with Google Wallet • Easily contact our award winning Customer Care representatives with shopping or order questions * Free standard shipping on orders $50 and up (applies to U.S. orders only. For expedited shipping, additional charges will apply. Offer applies to the lower 48 states. Offer excludes Alaska, Hawaii, APO/FPO and international orders. Sales tax and charitable donations are excluded from subtotal for purposes of this offer). Although the app does require certain permissions, we will NOT have access to your personal information and we do NOT track or collect any information from other apps. Supports Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich) and higher.

description: Now available 7’ and 10’ tablets Lose Weight After Pregnancy Try promotional prices – limited time 100% Advertise Free Recommended by gynecologist Dr. Katrin Seidelberg It is important to consult your doctor before starting an excercise program. Before your first training session, watch the entire workout video, to guarantee a successful training routine. This app does not have voice guides, therefore you can choose the right training tempo and regulate the training intensity for yourself. Start training slowly at first, if you feel like it, gradually increase the intensity. Train 3-4 times a week and leave at least one day between training sessions. Drink water whenever you feel the need to. Rest when you feel tired! If you can´t do the full workout do half. If you are training alone, have your baby next to you while exercising. Keep your training routine versatile and change workouts accordingly. Keep your diet healthy and diverse and do not train with an empty or full stomach. Always pay attention to your technique and posture. Download The Baby Weight App NOW and GET YOUR BODY BACK You need internet connection to make the app work info@babyweightapp.com

Use this App, and have everyone gawking at your creative talent! Doesn’t matter whether they be pictures or photographs, this App helps you create identical images. Draw identical copies of the images that appear on the Live View Screen – it will be as if you’re drawing with tracing paper(Tracing Phone)! Show off drawings created by yours truly! ★ Keep your smart phone steady with objects you find around the house, such as a thick dictionary, a book, or even a cup, in order to create better results. Using a smart phone holder is also another option. ★ In order to draw a picture of a photograph you have just taken, make sure that the background of the photograph is bright, as brighter the background, the better chances of being able to trace more precisely. This App allows you to become an illustrator, an artist. Want to be able to draw your versions of pretty, adorable comic characters? Want to draw a picture of our favorite celebrity? What to draw a beautiful picture of your family and loved ones? Want to draw a picture of your dream car? You don’t need to resister at an art school to learn to draw awesome pictures. Show off, or even offer these self-drawn pictures as presents to those around you. You can draw anything – from a photograph you have just taken to your favorite celebrity, a cool car, or even another drawing you have always liked. You can take a picture of your family then use it as a drawing tool, or even draw a picture of your loved one’s face on to a letter and have it sent. You can also select the type of picture you want to draw, you even trace a photograph in your photo gallery. To take advantage of this application, you can finish with oilpaper(transparent paper) or tracing reap the benefits of using a light box. It can also be utilized for children’s art education purposes. *Due to specific patents on this App, creating similar Apps may raise copyright issues. How to use: 1.Either choose a picture of your choice or even take an instant photograph. Fix your phone steady, choose to ‘draw’, then prepare to start your drawing. 2.When the tracing paper appears on screen, trace the image carefully by looking at the smart phone’s live view screen. Remember to switch on and off the options that make both the tracing paper, as well as the focus indicator, appear and disappear. 3.Once you are done tracing out a basic sketch of the image, adjust the transparency of the smart phone to control color, shading, and even texture, in order to express yourself. 4.If the focus of the Live View seems unsteady, switch on the automatic focus finder button to adjust the focus of the picture. Switch it off once you are ready once again. 5.Also, if you want to draw a picture of a photograph you have just taken, you need not do it on-site. Take it somewhere you are comfortable with, choose the “draw picture of image in photo gallery” option to view the photograph. You will be able to create a beautiful drawing of the image that had been saved on to your phone.

description: Very often together with the usual calculations we need to calculate the interest. The most simple operations is to add to or take a cent. Or is given to us to calculate the discount. This is a simple calculator with the ability to add to or take interest. Specially developed bright and friendly design. Also includes several built-in calculators: - Subtraction and addition of a percent. - What percentage. - Tip calculator. - The percentage of one number from another. - The calculator discount. - Change percent.

This app provides 1. Over 500 of the newest NYS Regents questions. 2. Regents practice quizzes by topic. 3. Full interactive regents exams. 4. Interactive swipe vocabulary flashcards. Teacher Review "As Science teacher, I find many obstacles in finding the perfect medium in which to share information with my students. This often includes hours of google searches, you tube searches, etc. This app is amazing! It takes those hours I used to spend and turns them into seconds with one touch of this app. I love it! Thanks again for creating such an awesome app that gives me hours of my life back! " In the information age of today education, learning and teaching is changing fast. The technology that is being used in and outside of the classroom is everywhere. Almost every student has a cell phone with access to the Internet. Even with out Internet access there are educational applications for iPhone, iPad, android, tablets and so on. The methods for teaching students and special needs students are expanding. Some schools are going all iPad. Meaning all students will have iPads with digital textbooks and new learning tools. For students these types of applications can be very useful. The student who cannot focus on one type of learning at a time can flip back and fourth through the app to stay focused. The student who is an extremely visual learner will be attracted to the devices colorful screen of pictures in the lesson. The student who has trouble writing notes or preparing them self for a test can simply open up previous lessons and practice on the interactive quizzes of the apps. The student who is a auditory learner can listen to nature sounds while reviewing topics or watch videos related to each topic. The very high performing student can find interesting topic related daily news and summarize it for the class. All of these options can be utilized through one educational app. Physics Regents Buddy is the ultimate tool for learning about the Physics. This app was designed by a teacher who has used all possible multimedia resources in the classroom for teaching regents curriculum. Physics Regents Buddy is not only an app for learning Physics, but also a app for teachers. The features of this app makes studying extremely convenient.

The ultimate app for sports bettors! We are a sports only community built by sports bettors because they wanted a better experience for checking live scores and odds. Sports odds and live markets from multiple sportsbooks, all the live match scores, breaking injury updates, up-to-date odds changes, all in the palm of your hand with the #1 sports odds & live scores app! Join the global sports betting community today and enter the discussion on today’s matches, betting markets, odds, team form, injuries and everything else.. With Onside Sports you get access to all the UK and Scottish football competitions and international football (soccer) including complete FIFA World Cup 2014 coverage in Brazil. Get advanced statistics on all the games to help you make an informed sports betting decision. In addition to having advanced stats at your fingertips, Onside is an active sports betting community where you can make tips (or virtual bets) and see predictions from a community of sports betting experts and handicappers. Also, track your performance to how you do. With millions of sports predictions and tips made, it is easily the largest such community on mobile today. The only app that has easy access to all the sportsbook odds on all the live games. Follow games in all the major UK & Scottish Football competitions: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, Scottish Premiership, Scottish Cup and More. Live sports scores and breaking injury updates from all the international football leagues like BBVA La Liga, German Bundesliga, Italian Serie A, UEFA Champions & Europa Leagues. Also, have coverage of major European soccer second and third leagues and the various domestic cups such as Copa del Ray, FA Cup, DFB Pokal and more. Recently added coverage for all the Latin American leagues such as Liga MX, Brazilian Serie A and Argentinian Premier League. Also includes all the major American leagues: NFL, NCAA Football & Basketball, MLB, NBA and NHL. We offer: • FREE Real time scores, formations, commentary and stats for all UK & Scottish football leagues including Barclay's Premier League, Scottish Premiership and more. Get all the info you need to make an informed bet. • FREE access to sportsbook betting odds and line moves from top global sports books - 1 X 2, asian handicaps, over/under totals, draw no bets, both teams to score and more. The most complete set of odds outside of a sportsbook or vegas on any mobile app. Also, get access to all the US odds including 2nd half betting on NBA Basketball and NFL football. • The fastest, most accurate push notifications on scores, line changes and breaking injury updates. Personalize the push notifications for free in our match alerts panel and never miss a beat on any of your matches. • Tipster challenges to compete with friends across any sport • Follow your favorite clubs from the Barclay’s Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, UEFA Champions & Europa Leagues, MLB, NFL, NCAAF, NCAAB, NBA and NHL, Liga MX, Argentine Premier Division, or just follow a game. • Deep and insightful matchup stats on every match. See a detailed breakdown of all the information you need to bet on games with consensus, odds and markets from multiple sportsbooks and team records against the various odds. • Make virtual sports tips on any game and track your performance. Share your tips with the community and start a discussion. See other people’s picks and finds find experts and tipsters for every league and bet type. Over 5 million tips have been made! • A sports betting community. Chat your people in the app, tweet out your tips or just post your opinions on lines and games. Try the app today! If you like it invite your friends. Please send us your feedback - we take all feedback including new feature requests into serious consideration!

description: Christmas Logo Trivial Quiz: this is quiz game that consists on guessing the names of hundreds of logos from different companies. Within days we will launch a new version with more logos, more levels and more! In brands with an ampersand in the name this can be replaced by 'and'. In brands with a dash in the name this can be left out. In brands with an apostrophe in the name this can be left out. Example: m&m's = mms There are 18 levels, with logos that you have to guess. When you're successful few will unlock the next level ...And the fun continues! More than 850 logos! These are many logos, but we are always looking for more logos to add to the game. But, How Many of Them Can You Recognize? Please note: All logos shown or represented in this game are protected by copyright and/or are trademarks of their respective corporations. This app, not anyone associated with it, claims any ownership (copyright or otherwise) of any logos used in this app. The logos are protected by copyright and/or trademark. The use of low res logo images in this app for use of identification qualifies as "Fair Use" under US copyright law. Keywords: christmas, christmas theme, gifts, winter, santa claus, quiz, logo, game, trivia, trivial guess Images from www.greatvectors.com

RoundMenu is your guide to dining out or ordering food delivery in over 20,000 restaurants in Dubai, Cairo, Riyadh and the MENA region. The app is full of restaurant reviews, social photos , restaurant maps and delivery menus. Discover, Dine and Share restaurants in Dubai, Riyadh, Cairo and other GCC cities. Features: - Discover restaurants near you for dining out or food delivery. - Find your favorite restaurants with with quick search. - View social photos and reviews from TripAdvisor, Foursquare and Instagram. - Connect with Facebook to get inspirations from friends. - Share your experience by posting photos and writing reviews. - Book your table fast , free and confirmed (Dubai & Cairo).

Jeux éducatifs (5) pour les enfants de 2 à 10 ans. Voix et textes en FRANCAIS. [Garantie sans virus et sans aucune publicité // Connexion à internet nécessaire pour charger les musiques et les consignes parlées / vous pouvez tester ce jeu dans sa version gratuite] >> Retrouvez "Barnabé", un petit chien courageux, dans son aventure et ses rencontres... La particularité de ce jeu est qu'il propose une véritable petite histoire, liée par 8 mini-jeux. L'enfant choisit s'il veut faire toute l'aventure, ou s'il veut juste jouer aux mini-jeux. Toutes les instructions sont orales (en français), et l'enfant est parfaitement autonome dans son jeu éducatif. Il y a 8 modes de jeux : - un jeu de calcul, lors duquel l'enfant devra aider Barnabé (le petit chien) à compter les oiseaux qui volent dans le ciel... - deux jeux de psychomotricité (coordination) dans lesquels l'enfant aidera Barnabé, à retrouver des petits marcassins et des bébés tortues, qui se sont perdus... - un jeu de répétition ; à la nuit tombée, Barnabé regarde les étoiles qui jouent de la musique... l'enfant devra reproduire les notes de musique en cliquant sur les bonnes étoiles... - deux jeux ludiques de coordination ; l'enfant devra guider Barnabé à sauter au bon moment par dessus des petits obstacles (fleurs, buissons, champignons...) jusqu'à la ligne d'arrivée... - un jeu de calcul et de coordination ; Barnabé aide un canard à attraper des pommes qui flottent sur la rivière, en faisant bien attention de ne pas attraper les poissons... - et un jeu de reconnaissance et d'identification, dans lequel l'enfant devra retrouver des fleurs particulières, dans un champ fleuri, pour composer un joli bouquet... Chaque mini-jeu évolue progressivement, et chaque victoire est encourageante pour l'enfant, accompagnée par des applaudissements, une musique et des "bravo !"... /* Si vous constatez un "bug", n'hésitez surtout pas à m'envoyer un mail : réponse assurée */ /* les mots d'encouragements sont aussi très très appréciés */ Pour l’anecdote, ce jeu a été réalisé pour ma fille de 3 ans et demi (très important, le "demi"). Et croyez-moi, ma fille est très "directe" (pour ne pas dire "sans pitié")... et je ne mets sur le Store que les jeux qui ont passé sa "validation"... Devant son succès, je l’ai mis sur le « Play Store ». Je suis sûr qu’il rendra vos enfants tout aussi heureux d’y jouer…

The particularity of this game is that it offers a true story, related by 8 mini games. The child decides whether to make any adventure, or just wants to play mini-games. All instructions are spoken (French), and the child is fully autonomous in its educational game. There are 8 game modes: - A set of calculations, in which the child will help Barnabas (the little dog) from the birds flying in the sky ... - Two sets of psychomotor (coordination) in which the child will Barnabas find small piglets and baby turtles that were lost ... - A repetition of game; at nightfall, Barnaby look at the stars who play the music ... the child will reproduce the musical notes by clicking on good star ... - Two fun games coordination; the child should guide Barnabas the right time to jump over small obstacles (flowers, shrubs, mushrooms ...) to the finish line ... - A set of calculation and coordination; Barnabas help a duck to catch apples floating on the river, being careful not to catch fish ... - And a set of recognition and identification, in which the child will find special flowers in a flower field, to compose a pretty bouquet ... Each mini-game is gradually changing, and every victory is encouraging for the child, accompanied by applause, music and "bravo!" ... / * If you find a "bug", do not hesitate to email me: guaranteed response * / / * The words of encouragement are also very much appreciated * / For the record, this game was made for my 3 year old daughter and a half (very important, "half"). And believe me, my daughter is very "direct" (not to say "no mercy") ... and I do not put on the Store that games that have passed its "validation" ... Before his success, I I put it on the "Play Store". I'm sure it will make your kids just as happy to play there ...

Frozen Air Hockey is the first ever multi-device multiplayer Air Hockey game for the Android! You can purchase the paid version of the game to host multiplayer games and your friends can play against you for free! Additionally, you can play singleplayer against a challenging AI, and send feedback and feature suggestions from inside the app itself. Upcoming features: - Desktop version for testing multiplayer against yourself or with friends. - Reworked physics engine. - Tweaking speeds, friction, and physics response. - Integrating input for multi-touch devices (for same-device multiplayer) - Increasing performance for slower devices. - Implementing popular suggestions sent from the 'Feedback' section of the game. Troubleshooting - I can't see other devices on the network. Make sure you are on the same WiFi connection and your host is using the paid version of the game. Restart the app and enter the games list around the same time. If all else fails, some wireless access points do not implement IPv4 multicast which is required for networked play. - The game crashes on my device or is really slow! I'm working hard to support as many devices as I can. Please send me a report from the 'Feedback' section of the game or e-mail me. - Anything else Shoot me an e-mail from the 'Feedback' section of the game. I'll do my best to support you.

[Jeu d'aventure - polar interactif en français / Garanti sans virus et sans publicité / il s'agit de la version gratuite et limitée du jeu - la version complète coûte seulement 2,25 euros] >> Si vous rencontrez un soucis avec le jeu (aide dans l'aventure ou soucis technique) : merci de contacter le support : mercure-co@live.fr // les demandes dans les évaluations du jeu ne sont pas prioritaires, car nous ne les traitons que ponctuellement. >> SYNOPSIS Après avoir arrêté un caïd de la mafia, Frederic Hunter, officier de police, doit se mettre au vert dans le village de son enfance... Mais dès son arrivée, il apprend la découverte du corps d'une jeune fille, Laura, au bord de la rivière. L'aventure commence : examinez le corps de la victime, parcourez le village, interrogez ses habitants... et tentez de découvrir ce qui est arrivé à la pauvre Laura : suicide, accident, ou meurtre ?... Au fil de l'enquête, l'aventure prend un tournant des plus mystérieux. Quelles sont ces lumières dans la forêt ? Pourquoi le corps de Laura semble présenter des radiations inconnues ? Que fait la DRM (services secrets de l'armée) au village ? Est-ce que la mafia va retrouver Frederic Hunter ?... Autant d'énigmes qu'il vous faudra résoudre pour comprendre ce qui se trame dans cet étrange village... >> /!\ RECOMMANDATIONS Le jeu est un polar interactif... Sans être violent, le contenu peut s'avérer de nature à choquer un public sensible ou jeune. Il est strictement déconseillé aux enfants (-18 ans) et aux personnes fragiles. >> /!\ IMPORTANT Le jeu contient énormément de contenus multimédia (+400Mo). Afin de ne pas surcharger les tablettes à faible capacité, le jeu n'installe pas les images de fonds, les musiques et les vidéos. Il les télécharge en direct sur un serveur, sans jamais les stocker. Le jeu ne pèse donc pas plus de 27mo. Chaque image doit mettre moins d'une seconde pour apparaître [entre instantanément et 0,75sec, dans des conditions normales]. Les premières images peuvent être plus longues (quelques secondes), mais tout rentre dans l'ordre petit à petit... Les images et leur chargement sont optimisés. Les musiques et bruitages sont pré-chargées dès le lancement du jeu. Quant à la vidéo, elle est chargée en streaming (en direct). >> Si malgré tous les efforts déployés pour optimiser les chargements, vous constatez des ralentissements, vérifiez que vous n'êtes pas trop loin de votre signal Wifi, qu'il n'est pas parasité, ou que votre réseau n'est pas saturé (téléchargement, multi-connexion)... La saturation de la mémoire peut occasionner des "plantages". Pour régler ce soucis, sauvegarder, quitter (complètement) le jeu, et charger votre partie. Cette procédure purge complètement la mémoire. Dans le cas contraire, merci d'envoyer un "Message" au support du jeu mercure-co@live.fr [Adventure Game - Interactive fiction in French / Guaranteed virus free and without advertising / he is the free limited version of the game - the full version costs only 2.25 euros] >> If you encounter problems with the game (with the adventure or technical problem): thank you contact support: mercure-co@live.fr / / requests in the ratings of the game are not a priority, because we not treat them only occasionally. Jeux éducatifs pour apprendre l'alphabet en douceur. Voix et textes en français. [Garantie sans virus et sans aucune publicité / vous pouvez tester ce jeu dans sa version gratuite] Jeux éducatifs pour apprendre à reconnaître les lettres de l'alphabet. Ce jeu, destiné aux enfants à partir de 2 ans, a la particularité de rendre l'enfant complètement autonome dans son apprentissage, même s'il ne sait pas lire, car il est uniquement réalisé à partir de symboles simples, et les instructions sont lues clairement (nécessité d’avoir du son). Ce jeu éducatif est entièrement en français (textes et voix). Il y a trois modes de jeux : - un jeu qui invite l'enfant à reconnaître la première lettre d'un animal ("A comme Abeille") - un jeu pour apprendre, facilement, à reconnaître une lettre parmi d'autres - un jeu pour apprendre à reconnaître une lettre parmi de nombreuses autres. Une musique très douce accompagne l’enfant dans son exercice, et à chaque fois qu’il trouve, il est encouragé dans ses efforts par des applaudissements et des "bravo". L’interface a été spécialement conçue pour les enfants. Le style graphique est doux et coloré, et propose une animation de plusieurs "scrollings" pour adoucir l’exercice. Les lettres se détachent de l’écran de manière beaucoup plus vive pour être bien identifiables par l'enfant. Ce jeu permettra à votre enfant d’apprendre, tout en s’amusant, à décrypter les lettres de l’alphabet, à les prononcer, à identifier les animaux (abécédaire)... et surtout, il passera un très agréable moment. Pour l’anecdote, ce jeu a été réalisé pour ma fille de 3 ans… Devant son succès, je l’ai mis sur le « Play Store ». Je suis sûr qu’il rendra vos enfants tout aussi heureux d’y jouer… Educational games to learn the alphabet smoothly. Voices and texts in French. [Warranty virus free and no advertising / you can test the game in its free version] Educational games to learn to recognize the letters of the alphabet. This game, for children from 2 years, has the distinction of making the child completely autonomous in their learning, even if he can not read because it is only made from simple symbols, and instructions are read clearly (need sound). This educational game is entirely in French (text and voice). There are three game modes: - A game that invites the child to recognize the first letter of an animal ("A Bee as") - A game to learn, easy to recognize a letter among other - A game to learn to recognize a letter among many others. A very soft music accompanies the child in the exercise, and every time it finds, it is encouraged in its efforts with applause and "Bravo". The interface has been specifically designed for children. The graphic style is sweet and colorful, and offers several animation "scrolling" to soften the year. The letters stand for the screen so much more vivid to be easily identified by the child. This game will help your child to learn while having fun, to decipher the letters of the alphabet, to pronounce, to identify animals (ABC) ... and most importantly, he spent a very pleasant time. For the record, this game was made for my 3 year old daughter ... of its success, I put on the "Play Store". I'm sure your children will be just as happy to play it ...

description: It’s summer vacation! Are you going on holiday with your family? You can go by car, train, bus or by airplane! In this game you are the stewardess who need to clean the airplane before the next flight. First you can do the indoor of the private jet. It’s a real mess in this plane can you help the stewardess to clean it up? There are 3 levels in this clean game for girls. ✔the indoor of the jet ✔ the cockpit ✔ the outdoor of the plane The visitors and the pilots made a big mess of the airplane when they were flying to their vacation destiny and now you can clean up the rubbish. You begin with cleaning up the indoor of the airplane. Do the mess in the dustbin and place the good things back where they belong. You also need to vacuuming and to dust the room. When you are ready with the indoor you go further with the cockpit. Also the pilot made a mess of the cockpit of his plane and stewardess cleans it up. Help her with the vacuum cleaner, window washing and throw the rubbish away. The pilots will be very happy with a clean cockpit and shiny windows! The last thing you need to do is washing the outdoor of the plane. During the flight the plane has become dirty. Wash and polish the airplane and give it the color you like and you can also choose a nice design. Do you like games to clean up the house but want something different? This game is the right game for you! This kids cleaning game is a nice variation. Features of free airplane flight clean up: ❀ clean up game for girls, kids and toddlers ❀ easy to play ❀ with three levels ❀ summer holiday style Do your kids love cleaning games? Then they will like this game! Special for the summer holiday we designed this airplane flight clean up game. Airplane flight clean up is a game from Top Girl games and one of the best clean up game for kids and toddlers, we publish many different easy to play girl game apps. We hope you will enjoy our Airplane flight clean up and we hope you give us the love by liking our Facebook page or follow us on twitter. So we can keep you up to date on our girl games, dressup, spa salon and cleaning up games. ♥ Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/LadiesDressUp ♥ Twitter - https://twitter.com/ladiesdressup

My Color Guide guives you access to thousands of colors and palettes (including Sherwin-Winlliams, and RAL pallettes). Share the colors and their hex code with your clients and friends by email. This application helps you keep an inventory and wish list of colors that you can browse anytime. You can also use My Color Guide with the camera on your phone to tell you the names of colors in real-time and save them into custom palettes. Must have app for graphic designers, painters, artists, illustrators and color lovers alike! Features: • Capture a color from your phone camera and match it to one of thousand available colors. • Modify Contrast, Saturation, Brightness and Hue of Camera Stream • Create a custom palette. • Search for specific colors or browse the full RAL, Sherwin-Williams and custom color palettes. • Save colors to your custom palettes to compare palettes or share with friends and family via email. • Learn color names, RGB values, and hexadecimal numbers. • Available in 6 different languages (English, German, French, Spanish, Netherlands and Italian) Due to technical limitations, colors seen within the application may not accurately reflect real colors. We are actively adding new features to this app, so please send us feedback to emmanuel.garnier.dev@gmail.com . We read every email!

Multiplication Hero is one of the best math games for free! Train your brain and math skills with this game! Solve math tasks and get to the highscore. The rules are simple: You will get different multiplication tasks. To solve them, click on one of the four presented solutions at the bottom of the screen. Only one solution is correct. For every correct answer you will get a point. If the answer is wrong a point will be subtracted. You have 200 seconds for the game! Multiplication Hero is an addicting math game for those that like to play games online for free. It is a great educational game for kids and students. If you like other puzzles and number games you will love Multiplication Hero - one of the best math games for Android!

OpenConnect is an SSL VPN client for Cisco AnyConnect and ocserv gateways. FEATURES - One-click connection (batch mode) - Supports RSA SecurID and TOTP software tokens - Keepalive feature to prevent unnecessary disconnections - Compatible with ARMv7, x86, and MIPS devices - No root required - 100% open source (GPLv2+); 100% free; no ads - Based on the popular OpenConnect Linux package REQUIREMENTS - An account on a suitable VPN server - Android 4.0 (ICS) or higher (with working VpnService + tun infrastructure) XDA thread and FAQ: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2616121 Source code: https://github.com/cernekee/ics-openconnect Please do not use the reviews to request features or report issues, as they do not provide a suitable forum for support. Please post your question in the XDA thread, file a bug report in the Github project, or email me directly at cernekee+oc@gmail.com .

description: Defend the planet against a shower of asteroids in this retro style arcade game. Your job is to blast as many asteroids as you can out of the sky. They start out slow, but don't let that fool you. They'll begin to get faster and come at you from different directions as you try to dodge them. Try not to let too many get past you or you'll lose points. Just touch the sides of the screen to move left or right and the gun shoots automatically.

description: TIC TAC TOE FREE MULTIPLAYER TWO PLAYER PLAY ★ FREE ★ GAME MODE ★ HUMAN vs COMPUTER ★ HUMAN vs HUMAN ★ CHANGE FIVE SKIN GAME PLAY CUTE ★ Results tracking – win / lose / draw statistics ★ Add name Player ★ Free tic tac toe game for everyone! Simple, fun, and relaxing! Tic Tac Toe Challenge is a free game for fans of classic and popular two-player paper-and-pencil puzzle. This simple yet exciting puzzle provides great way to pass time, weather alone, in company with friends, or with kids. You can play against device (one-payer vs. AI), with friend (two-player on your android), or against players from all over the world (multiplayer online challenge). Exercise your logic skills by playing this simple rules puzzle! Tictactoe (also tik tak toe, tick tack toe, or Xs and Os) is played on 3x3 grid by two players, X and O, who in turn mark empty grid spaces. The player who aligns 3 in a row, horizontally, vertically, or diagonally, wins the game! FOUR GAME MODES: * Classic – Relax playing against your mobile or tablet (one-player vs. AI)! * 2-Player – Play with friend on your device, or teach kids how to play! * Timed – Exercise your speed, and learn to get winning in seconds! * Challenge – Play online Scoreloop challenges against real opponents! FEATURES: * Original, human-like AI, making this puzzle always interesting. * Awards – unlock over 40 achievements, and get rewarded with in-app Coins. * Leaderboards - online world-wide high scores. * Results tracking – win / lose / draw statistics. * Coins – in-app virtual money, used to unlock levels or play challenges. * 12 free levels. * Optimized for various screen sizes and all screen resolutions (including HD). * Provides optimal user experience on mobiles and tablets. Tic Tac Toe Challenge combines strategy game playing, time pressure workout and joys of online competition. Master this game and you will never lose against real opponent again! Note: App is free; it includes unobtrusive traditional ad formats only.
release_text: TIC TAC TOE FREE MULTIPLAYER TWO PLAYER PLAY ★ FREE ★ GAME MODE ★ HUMAN vs COMPUTER ★ HUMAN vs HUMAN ★ CHANGE FIVE SKIN GAME PLAY CUTE ★ Results tracking – win / lose / draw statistics ★ Add name Player

L'applicazione gratuita del Cine Città Fiera di Torreano di Martignacco offre gli orari completi di tutti i film in programmazione, sia quelli odierni che quelli dei prossimi giorni. Puoi consultare le trame dei film, vedere i trailer e prenotare i migliori posti in sala, selezionandoli direttamente sulla mappa posti. L'applicazione mostra in tempo reale gli orari della biglietteria del cinema, per essere sempre aggiornata sulle ultime novità e variazioni: nel caso la biglietteria del cinema non fosse raggiungibile (adsl guasta), l'applicazione mostrerà un messaggio di mancato collegamento, ma gli orari torneranno appena il collegamento sarà ripristinato. Questo può succedere usando un collegamento in tempo reale, ma abbiamo preferito questa scelta per poter presentare sempre le informazioni più aggiornate. I nuovi orari dei film vengono impostati nelle biglietterie del cinema ogni mercoledì, per il periodo compreso tra giovedì e mercoledì della settimana seguente. Scaricando l'applicazione dichiari di accettare la Privacy Policy consultabile al seguente indirizzo: http://tixproduction.com/home/informativa-sulla-privacy.html The free app Cine City Fair Torreano of Martock offers a complete timetable of all the films in programming as well as those of today and those of the next few days. You can see the plots of the movie, see the trailer and book the best seats in the room, selecting them directly on the seat map. The application displays in real time times the box office of the film, to be always up to date on the latest news and changes: if the ticket of film can not be reached (ADSL fault), the application will show a missed connection, but times will return as soon as the connection is restored. This can happen using a real-time connection, but we preferred this option to always present the latest information. The new schedule of the films are set in movie ticket every Wednesday, for the period between Thursday and Wednesday of the following week. By downloading the application you agree to the Privacy Policy available at the following address: http://tixproduction.com/home/informativa-sulla-privacy.html
release_text: - Nuova grafica - Locandine e scheda dei film - Migliorata compatibilità - Bug Fix - Consultazione offline delle prenotazioni

description: L'applicazione gratuita Cinema di Napoli ti permette di consultare sia la programmazione odierna che quella dei prossimi giorni dei cinema Metropolitan, Multisala Filangieri e America Hall di Napoli. La programmazione cinematografica viene inserita ogni settimana tra il mercoledì e il giovedì per il periodo compreso tra venerdì e giovedì della settimana successiva. Puoi consultare gli orari di tutti gli spettacoli e scegliere i migliori posti in sala selezionandoli direttamente sulla mappa. Scaricando l'applicazione dichiari di accettare la Privacy Policy consultabile al seguente indirizzo: http://tixproduction.com/home/informativa-sulla-privacy.html The free app Film Naples allows you to see both the programming today that one of the coming days of the Metropolitan cinema, multiplex Filangieri and America Hall of Naples. The film program is inserted between every week on Wednesdays and Thursdays for the period between Friday and Thursday of the following week. You can view the timetables of all the shows and choose the best seats in the room by selecting them directly on the map. By downloading the application you agree to the Privacy Policy available at the following address: http://tixproduction.com/home/informativa-sulla-privacy.html

app_name: Sexy Zone　コミュニティー
description: ジャニーズの大人気グループ『Sexy Zone（セクシー ゾーン）』の情報交換ができる非公式アプリです。 ★使用方法 　アプリをダウンロードしたら、起動してプロフィールを登録して下さい。 　登録したプロフィールで各掲示板に書込みを行えます。 　書込みを行う場合は、各掲示板右上の「コメント」ボタンを押すとコメント入力画面が表示されます。 　【掲示板の種類】 　　・メンバー個別 　　・TV番組 　　・コンサート 　　・メンバー全員について 　　・友達募集（ファン同士の交流） 　　※追加希望の掲示板があればメールにてお知らせ下さい。 ☆Sexy Zoneのメンバー 　 　佐藤勝利（さとう しょうり） 　中島健人（なかじま けんと） 　菊池風磨（きくち ふうま） 　松島聡（まつしま そう） 　マリウス葉（まりうす よう） It is an unofficial app that can exchange information "Sexy Zone (Sexy Zone)" popular group of Johnny. ★ How to use Once you download the app, register the profile by starting. You can write to each bulletin board in the profile that you have registered. If you want to write, comment input screen is displayed if you press the top right of each bulletin board the "comment" button. [Kind of bulletin board] Individual members · TV program Concert · For all members · (Alternating between fans) Friends Wanted ※ Please let us know by e-mail if there is a bulletin board for additional desired. ☆ member of Sexy Zone Sato victory (sugar legal rule) Kento Nakajima (Nakajima Kent) KazeMigaku Kikuchi (Kikuchi Fuuma) Satoshi Matsushima (Matsushima likely) Marius leaves (like Marius)

THIS GAME IS FUNNY! Your toddlers and babies will love this fireworks game. This game is very funny for the preschool children. When they have played for the first time, your todddlers and babies may not be able to correctly touch the moving balloons with his/her little hands. Play the "Fireworks Balloon Pop" game with your baby continuously for a few hours or days, and you will be surprised at the mobile development of your baby's hands. "Fireworks Balloon Pop" game must be played in the presence of parents, and it is encouraged for you to guide your baby through the game for a few days at first. WHEN TO PLAY! When your baby is hungry or will not stop crying, playing this game can hold your baby's attention. (The various sounds, animated shapes stimulate your baby's curiosity.) This game is exceptionally handy for mothers and fathers who spend time with their babies but cannot figure out how to spend that time usefully. This game may be too advanced for infants under 6 months old. CAUTION! Playing the application too much or leaving the children alone with the mobile phone or tablet pc is not encouraged. Please feel free to notify us! Thank You...

Darbuka or Doumbek is an oriental rhythm instrumant. This application is a darbuka-doumbek simulator. You will enjoy while playing this exotic instrument. Your toddlers will love his application! Play Darbuka together with them. This game will be first darbuka - doumbek lesson of your toddler for preschool. This application will improve rhythm sense of you or your babies/toddlers. Download Now, and enjoy it... Please feel free you feed back to notify us. Thank you.

description: Mobile E-magazine "Science News". Application includes articles, news and reviews about the technology, and medicine, space and archaeology, business, art and other interesting subjects, collected from various sources. Science News is updated every day. This application allows you to conveniently view a list of articles and if you want to open a detailed view articles with minimal user interface for ease of reading in any place and at any time. List of articles and topics constantly updated. At this point, the application has around 8 topics: - Technique - Research - Space - Health and Medicine - Archeology - Auto - Business - Culture

description: Word Solver is a fast dictionary search app for help with all word based games. Scrabble, WordSmith, Words With Friends, Word Game, DroidWords, Literati, WordWise, Crosswords, Word Mix & WordFeud Features: - Built-in popular dictionaries (SOWPODS, TWL, ENABLE) - Dictionaries installed on your phone - no network access required - Toggle background transparency (see the game underneath) - A choice of dictionary definitions to use - Enter up to 8 letters, unlimited board letters and 2 blanks - Sort the results by length or score in order to find the best playable word - Runs in status bar for quick access within games - Three seperate tabs for Anagrams, Scrabble and Crosswords - Records last word search - Highlights board, rack and blank letter for easy identification - Two letter word reference list available from options menu. - In-app email support lets you ask questions and report problems Paid version features: - Unlimited word length and search results - No advertising

description: Recordable is the easy way to create high quality screen recordings on Android. Upload videos of your Minecraft worlds, capture your Clash Of Clans attacks, make screen recordings for promotional videos, tutorials, screencasts or simply share your finest moments! Recordable is the screen recorder which: * Is simple to install and easy to use * Records your audio and gestures * Supports almost all tablets and phones * Easily shares videos to YouTube, Facebook, Twitter etc. * Does not require root Most devices can simply download an activator app to allow capturing of the screen. Other devices will need a Windows, Mac or Linux computer to activate over USB or root. Note: if you use a computer you'll need to activate every time you reboot your device. A selection of some five star reviews: Karlo Valerio on Apr 29: At first, I was a little sketchy, probably because I'd tried almost every other no-root method of video recording for android, and some were even more expensive than this one (yes, I waste money). So imagine how sceptical I was when I saw that you just follow the step by step instructions all the way through, and wow. I was amazed by how little lag there is in the recordings. I'm using my unrooted Nexus 5, and this works pretty much flawlessly for me. Jakov Pavic on Apr 25: I love this app. Doesn't lag and don't need root. Thank you very much for the app. Josh Jones on Mar 22: Just saw the update of this and tried it out. The quality is good, the fps is incredible when on no limit but the only potential problems are the power of your device, which can hinder your Max fps, and the amount of storage it can take up. Otherwise, a real gem like I said when I reviewed the previous version of this. If you're looking for a screen recorder, this is the one to have. Jacob Rook on Mar 3: I am running a non-rooted device and this app works amazingly! Ive been looking for screen recorders that dont require root and a lot of them make you download all this stuff then end up not even working. I give this app 5 stars! Thank you so much for developing it! Caleb Swanson on Feb 26: I have been searching for a no root screen recorder forever and I finally found it! Its so easy to do! And I bet there are people complaining that you have to connect your device to the computer but they give you a step by step tutorial that takes about five minutes! Trust me its not a waste! Thanks SOOOOO much for making this! Nick Wolf on Feb 5: The best recorder that does not require root. Other apps do not really work or dont work at all. For a comparison of Android screen recorders see: http://recordable.mobi/compare Free demo version available from http://recordable.mobi/free Follow Recordable on Google+ and YouTube http://plus.google.com/+RecordableMobiApp/posts http://www.youtube.com/user/RecordableMobi

description: The National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE) has developed this free app as a useful offline reference for the British National Formulary (BNF). The NICE BNF app is currently only available to NHS staff in England, Scotland and Wales. Aimed at pharmacists, doctors, nurses, social care professionals and other healthcare professionals who prescribe and administer medicines, the app provides easy offline access to-up-to-date practical information on prescribing, dispensing and administrating medicines. To use the NICE BNF app for the first time and to activate any content updates, you will need to enter your NHS Athens user name and password. Users in England can register for an NHS Athens account by selecting the Journal and Database section on NHS Evidence. Users in Scotland can register for an NHS Athens account by visiting The Knowledge Network website and selecting the login option at the top of the homepage. Users in Wales register for an NHS Athens account by visiting the NHS Wales e-Library for health website and selecting the Athens option on the homepage. Social care staff who meet the NHS Athens eligibility criteria can also download and access the content. Features include: • Browse and search offline up-to-date content from the British National Formulary (BNF) • Optimised for Android phones and tablets • Auto-complete search with filters for chapters, monographs, interactions and preparations • Update notifications when new editions or updates are available • Content bookmarking • Accessible reading features

description: Hearing Test is a fun and easy to use hearing test app for Android. This hearing test plays 8 tones at different frequencies. If you cannot hear all of the frequencies or notice a distinct volume change, you may have a hearing loss. Humans can generally hear sounds with frequencies between 20 Hz and 20,000 Hz although this range varies significantly with age and gender. The majority of people can no longer hear 20,000 Hz by the time they are teenagers and progressively lose the ability to hear higher frequencies as they get older. Please not that this app is for entertainment purposes only. It is not a diagnostic test and should not replace regular audiometric testing provided by recognized professionals.

description: PH Balance Diet For More Energy PH Balance Diet or known as PH Miracle Diet will help balance your body and increase your energy. Have you ever put low quality fuel into your car machine after running it on premium fuel? There is a difference in acceleration, handling, and overall performance and this is directly linked to the quality of fuel you put in the tank. Your body is a finely tuned machine. Like other types of machinery, the parts need to be kept running by fuel. The best fuel for your body is a custom mix, more alkaline than acid. Red blood cells are the commuting traffic riding along the bloodstream in a hurry to get to work. These red blood cells each have a negative charge on them, and this keeps them from getting into fender benders and collisions in the bloodstream. When the negative charge is stripped away from the red blood cells, they cluster together and can cause gridlock and bottlenecks in the bloodstream. In short, the traffic in the bloodstream isn’t flowing as smoothly and it causes everything to slow down. If you’ve ever been stuck in freeway traffic you know how frustrating this is. This stress on the body causes a domino effect, which eventually saps the energy away and ... PH Balance Diet can help you avoid all of these effects.

Serenity for Android is a client for Plex. It provides an optimized layout for large screen devices, tablets, Android TV, and navigation using a remote control or keyboard. Serenity lets you access videos, and music to play on your device. You can use the internal video player or external players are supported if the videos do not play on your device with the internal player. You must have a plex media server installed locally to use Serenity. Note: Android TV and tablet device users are recommended to use an external video player for the best playback experience. Users should review the FAQ if you are using cloud servers instead of local servers. Support and FAQs: * FAQ: https://github.com/NineWorlds/serenity-android/wiki/Frequently-Asked- Questions What is supported: * Server auto discovery and configuration * Video Queue and Continuous playback * Playback video trailers on most devices. * Optimized layout for TV screens and larger tablets. * All screens remote, game controller, and D-PAD optimized. * Movie and TV Show libraries * Music Libraries * Internal or external video player support. Enhanced support for some popular players is provided. * Automatic subtitle selection configuration option * Update viewing position when using external player * User configurable layout preferences and starting categories * Multiple Layouts (Grid View and Detail View) * Download videos to the device * Content filtering via categories * App localization for English, Spanish, and French. What is not supported: * Transcoding of video or audio. * Most phones are not supported. * Photo Libraries * Cloud services Depending on the device not all videos will play back. It is highly dependent on the video and audio codecs the device supports. The wider the supported codecs the more it can play back.
release_text: 1.9.4 * Remove hardware microphone requirement. * Restore compatibility with Google TV and Android TV devices

description: Vatican Radio presents its first App for Android with a strong multimedia identity. News, editorials, live videos, web text, audio channels, all contained in a single app that lets you follow the Pope’s activities in real time. The App is free of charge and the initial version is available in English and Italian. The application opens onto the Agenda of the Pope’s public appointments. A system called Vatican TIC, devised and produced by Vatican Radio, lets you access all the text and audio content associated with each event. The Agenda tells you in real time about papal celebrations broadcast live and produced in collaboration with the Vatican Television Centre. The texts of the Pope’s discourses are also available, as published on www.vatican.va. The App also offers a News service that includes the latest information concerning the Church and the World, broadcast by Vatican Radio’s news programmes. The Radio section contains five audio channels corresponding to the network of over 70 daily programmes in 40 languages produced by Vatican Radio. The same channels are used for FM, AM, Short Wave and Satellite broadcasts. The papal Agenda and News functions of this App run on Android 2.3 and higher. The Android 3.0 or higher is needed to access the Radio function and audio streaming channels. An Android 4.0 or higher is required to view the video streaming of the live broadcasts. This is Vatican Radio’s first version of this App. We promise to continue doing our best to improve and update. Stay with us.

description: Use this app to connect to a Z21 Digital Center. With this app you can manage locomotive libraries, locomotives and locomotive functions, program digital components and of course control all locomotives with DCC- or Motorola-decoder, as easy and convenient as is only possible with touch-technology. The digital switchboard Z21 connects your model train unit and your digital locomotives with your Android device via WLAN. This way you can control the operation on your train layout easily and conveniently from your mobile device. Model train control was never this easy and convenient: With one swipe of your hand you can scroll to your model of choice in the locomotive library. A slight touch on the headlight symbol and the front and backlights go on. A second touch, this time on the speaker symbol, and the locomotive makes a sound. Drag your finger over the speed indicator and the train accelerates. The further highlights of the Z21-Mobile-App - Control your entire layout with an intuitive, graphic interface and have easy access to the entire scope of functions of your digital locomotives. - Manage your entire locomotive-library in just one application, including individual locomotive images for an ideal overview. - Control the digital functions of your locomotives with intuitive function symbols instead of complicated key combinations. - Download drivers cabs for even more reality - Create locomotives, wagons, accessory and trains to drive with - Place turnouts, turnout routes and notes on your track to interact with your railroad
release_text: Update in-app billing to v3 french translation fix

description: Magic Hexagon is a top puzzle game developed and published by iBit Game Studio Challenge yourself with one of the hardest puzzle game ever. Try Magic Hexagon and you will just be addicted! How to play: - Choose and rotate the inner hexagons to make the image the same. Be careful as every move counted. You cannot undo, and if you use more moves than allowed, it will be game over! The game features 2 game play mode: - Free mode: You are free to practice your move with random puzzle. - Challenge mode: Test your skill with 32+ brain-wrecking difficult game levels. Most people could not even get pass level 15 of this game. Good luck! And don't forget to share your result with your friends! Please support Magic Hexagon by leaving comments. All suggestions are welcomed.

description: Limited Offer - Free for a limited time!! Maze City: Bomber Adventure is a unify of the classical game play and high definition graphics. The game features hundreds of dungeons in Maze City, with extremely smart and deadly monsters, traps, moving obstacles, treasure boxes and more. Player controls the bomber hero fighting ferocious monsters to complete his goal (looking for the keys to the final gate, saving the princess or just manage to get out of from a deadly pyramid) His only weapons is a small pack of bomb - boom (dynamite). Use it wisely or he will end up in monster's stomach! Victory is not for the faint of heart! How to Play: - Use direction buttons to move the player - Use the boom button to plan bomb. Regular bomb will explode after 3s - Bomb size and damage varies based on items you found - Items may boost character stats (but there might also be side effects!) - Avoid monster and bomb explosions! - Defeat the monster (some monsters e.g the pharaoh are immortal) , find the key to the next level - And don't forget the stars, you will need them to unlock the next episode. - Saving coins to unlock new game character, item and levels Game features: - Classical onscreen game controller - Blazing fast action - Smart monsters - Huge dungeons with many type of monsters (maze style) - Breakthrough game play - Huge collections of item under hidden treasure boxes - Score and star assessment system - Amazing effects - And much more! - Support game controller, keyboard via OTG cable - Now support Google Play Game Services, Leader Boards and Achievements! Future Update: - Multiplayer player via Bluetooth, WIFI or Data Network. - New monsters, levels - New type of boom, dynamites, character and game mode Try to get the maximum of star after each level!!! Enjoy Maze City: Bomber Adventure and support us by leaving comments. Thanks Developed and published by iBit Game Studio.

Another way to learn English more effectively This app contains over 700 common and useful expressions or phrases which you can use to improve and strengthen your English skills. All phrases and expressions in this app are based on Britain English.

Each list comes with various kinds of topics and conversations helps you express your ideas, describe your problems etc. in daily situations. Besides, audio script included in every conversation will aid your listening and learning English. Features: * 15 different lists with 273 topics and conversations. * Clear audio script for each conversation. If you like this app, don't forget to rate it and review it in the App Store. You can send us your valuable feedback to make this app become better and more helpful. Thanks a lot! Inside Cube space, Guide the sphere to the exit. Only a cube can stop it once the sphere moves. So use the cube wisely to reach the exit. But it won't be as easy as that! Portals, switches and even movable cube will challenge your brain. The game features 24 mind-bending levels along with local highscores and a time attack mode. Create your own levels with the ingame Cube editor. Enjoy the 3d graphics and a soundtrack written by bitbof. Try the tutorial first to find out how to play the game. If the game runs to slow, try to disable the bloom effect in the options. The game needs more processing power on tablets because of the higher resolution. Love Fruit Ninja but get bored with old challenges? Try our new Food Ninja right now, more exciting games and interesting characters are waiting for you! Imagine being a Ninja with a sword on your hand,your mission is to slice pieces of delicious foods: - Swipe your screen to cut the moving food pieces. - You will get bonus point whenever more than one piece are cut at a swipe. - Do not to cut the bomb appears next to food. If you cut the bomb, everything will explode and ofcourse, you lose. As Fruit Ninja there are several game modes in this game: - Play time mode: cut as much food in the fixed time of the game as possible. Try to get the highest score out of the limited time. - Play network mode: you have 3 playing times in a screen play, every time you drop 1 piece of food, you will lose 1 life.

description: Accept Credit Cards 1.0 Accept credit card payments on your android mobile using the www.planetauthorize.net credit card payment gateway. To register a PlanetAutorize account goto http://www.planetauthorize.net/index-3.html and click on Register as a Certified Provider link. To accept payments: 1. Fill in Merchant Details, Client Card Details, SMTP settings. 2. Press the "Charge" button. Wait a couple of seconds. You will receive either "Approved" message, "Decined" message or "Error in transaction data". The last message happens when invalid credit card data is supplied by customer. A receipt representing the transaction will be sent to both client and merchant. Client Card Details Section 1. Fill all the client details: Card number, Cvv, Card Lastname, Expiry Date, Amount, Client Email 2. Client Email will receive transaction receipt. Merchant Details Section 1. Scroll down the screen to find the merchant details. 2. Fill in all the merchant details: PlanetAutorize username, PlanetAutorize password, Merchant Email, Merchant Name. 3. Merchant Email will receive all transaction receipts. Merchant Name and Email will be added to all client receipts. 4. Merchant details are saved on app exit and restored at startup. SMTP Settings 1. Scroll the screen to find SMTP settings. 2. Fill in all SMTP settings: Gmail username, Gmail password. 3. Gmail address and Gmail password will be used to send receipts to clients and the merchant. The app uses smtp.gmail.com for sending receipts. Register for a gmail account at gmail.google.com if you do not have one.

description: Make your telephone or tablet speak to you with Voxygen’s Best-of-Vox Voices. The Agnès voice reads aloud any French text. Get rid of flat voices with no expression or personality! Discover Natural and Fun Voices, and listen to a sample here: http://www.best-of-vox.com/android . Follow us on Twitter http://twitter.com/VoxygenSAS to keep up with new voices! Like us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/voxygen.fr ★ What is it for? Various ways to use Best-of-Vox voices: voice guidance, E-books and SMS reading, ring tones, alarm clocks, Android accessibility features with Talkback and much more. Share your messages from the Best-of-Vox application on your preferred social networks: SoundCloud, WhatsApp, Skype, hubiC, Evernote, Drive, etc. ★ How does it work? The Best-of-Vox application allows you to type or paste text and to have it read out aloud by the voice that you have chosen. You can then save it as a ringtone or share it with your friends on SoundCloud ! From your emails, your Internet browser, or any compatible application, select some text and make your Best-of-Vox voice read it aloud by simply clicking on the “share” menu. ★ How to install it? Only 2 clicks to activate the Best-of-Vox voice in the Android settings that you reach from the application's main menu. Watch the installation video and follow the instructions. Please note: with Android versions prior to 4.0, one additional first click is required at the bottom of the settings list in order to activate the voice. ★ How to fix an occasional problem? – Cannot hear the Best-of-Vox: First ensure that the volume of your device is sufficient. If this is the case, than it may be that the voice's data was corrupted during or after its installation. In order to reinitiate the voice, please perform the following steps: go to “Android Settings / Applications / Manage applications / Best-of-Vox voice”, click on “Force stop”, click on “Clear data”, return to the home screen, ensure that the device is connected to a Wi-Fi network (which is required to download the data), restart the Best-of-Vox application, wait for the download and data preparation to be fully completed, enter some text and click on the “play” button. Questions? Please contact android@voxygen.fr . Credits: Moteur de synthèse vocale / Voix de synthèse / Synthèse vocale / Speech synthesis / TTS / tts / Text To Speech / Texttospeech / Speech synthesis engine / TTS engine / Synthetic voice / TTS voice : http://www.best-of-vox.com/android
release_text: Version 1.4 : - pause button - save voice settings as default - master volume + voice volume - download gui - gui optimized

Moobo Music Player - beautiful and powerful music player for Android! The music player is one of your essential software . Moobo Music Player features a beautiful, fast and intuitive interface, alongside powerful audio configuration options. In addition, support cloud service, and download free music from cloud. Key features: • Popular format playback Listen to music in popular formats: MP3, MP2, MP1, OGG, WAV, AIFF, MIDI, AAC, AAC+, 3GP, XM, IT, S3M, MOD, MTM, UMX, MO3, MP4, M4A, OTA • Cloud music service (jamendo website Community Provided ,only for mp3) There are millions of songs on the cloud , you can track keyword search, you can listen, you can free download. There are no borders between folders and media library anymore. • Lyric support Automatic scanning device lyrics file , matching the most appropriate lyrics file .In the playback interface scrolling display lyrics . • Gorgeous design Has more than 18 kinds of background skins you can choose to make your music player unique. • Ability to edit the songs You do not have to worry about some of the songs without album name or artist name, can edit song information by yourself. • Gorgeous Homescreen widgets Listen to music from your mobile desktop. You can choose on of three homescreen widgets: 4x1, 4x2, 2x2.
