﻿Hey you!, wake up! You are only one click too far from a new amazing way to think at your alarm clock and start your journey just like a boss! [b]UPDATE v1.9![/b] zZzAlarm starts its way to Lollipop, with a complete restyle in progress; plus we introduced a new way to use the app, something like a Lite version: it's the same wonderful zZzAlarm but without the tab Profiles, so that you'll find more easy and more convenient to set your usual alarms! Advanced users, on the contrary, or everyone who loves our powerful Profiles engine, could use the standard version as always! Enjoy zZzAlarm! AND DON'T FORGET TO LEAVE A REVIEW, IF YOU PLEASE! Features like: local or YouTube videos, weather, different alarms modes to set up depending to the weather itself, custom pre-alarm, ultra alarm tone, horoscope, voice recognition for snoozing and stopping, Text To Speech for RSS Feeds, weather, fortunes etc, vocal notes and more and more... zZzAlarm is the smartest alarm clock: no other apps on the GooglePay Store are able to do something like what we can do, every day, just for you; that's for sure! We are always trying to improve your experience with our application, so stay in touch with us through our social accounts or our blog and let us know what you would like to see into the app! ---> FEATURES ** YOUTUBE or LOCAL VIDEO zZzAlarm can wake up you showing your favorite YouTube video, searching an artist, song or words. Still better, you can also select part of a video and set it as tone. Just choose it! ** WAKE UP ON WEATHER zZzAlarm controls the weather to wake up when you want. You'll be able to sound the alarm only with certain weather conditions (sunny, cloudy, rain and snow) or wake up before / after the occurrence of any of these. You can also assign a specific ringtone to a weather condition. (Trial version available into the app) ** PREALARM Enable Prealarm to wake up better. With this feature you can search the REM stage during your sleep to wake up rested. (This plugin should be purchased separately) ** SUPER ALARM Are you afraid of not hearing the alarm and do not wake up? Activates the SUPER ALARM to forget about it! ** HOROSCOPE Wake up with your horoscope and find out what awaits you in the day. ** CUSTOM STOP No more sequent alarm created with the fear stop it by mistake, you can now decide when show the stop button and forget about this problem for all. ** VOICE RECOGNITION Use a word or phrase you like to snooze or stop your alarm. ** SPEAKING ALARM (TTS) It's possible to read automatically any information which the alarm show. You can also add custom phrase, weather, time and all others. ** VOICE NOTE Talk to your device and tell him what kind of note to remember and not worry about, no more overcooked foods or missed appointments! *** PROVERBS, FORTUNE COOKIE, KAMASUTRA Enable this plugin to have a proverb at every alarm, a fortune cookie and a Kamasutra position, a possible idea if you wake up in good company. (Trial version available into the app) ** OTHER FEATURES * fade in ringtone: choose how much time for a gentle awakening; * snooze/stop by shaking the device; * read your favorite news through RSS: you can read the feeds of other users or share yours; * Post-it: read and edit post-it on your alarm; * ability to fully customize the skin of application: you can download new skins and share your with other users; * more and more options Currents supported languages: English, Italian. WARNING: zZzAlarm isn't yet optimized for tablet over 7''. _______________________ SOCIAL & CONTACTS Blog: http://zzzalarm.zer0lab.net/ Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/zZzAlarm Twitter: http://twitter.com/zZzAlarm Google+: http://plus.google.com/116638260052406690791 Google+ Community: http://plus.google.com/communities/117805515427650559351 YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnt2dcfGA6cLsyZZ9E2luFQ Email: zer0lab.dev@gmail.com

description: *** GetMe2 Adelaide has reached the end of its life, please see the new and fully featured GetMe2 Transit. Full trip planner, timetables stored on your device, easier to use and real time transit in selected locations! *** -Ad supported version, limits number of favourite routes/trips that can be saved- GetMe2 Adelaide is designed to get you from where you are to where you want to go, all using the public transport system available to you! Bus, Train and Tram times are stored on your phone so once you're up and running no Internet connection is required to access times. Some features include: - Stop selection via map (no need to know your stop number) - Point to point allowing selection of a departure and arrival point, the rest of the work will be done for you! - Ability to find stops near your location and display the routes of all services departing these stops - Stop times displayed on the map for each stop - Set an alarm before your service departs/arrives/transfers - Support for service transfers. This means all trip times are displayed, unlike other transport apps that sometimes miss over half of the services available - Journey planner with customisable transfer time links multiple services so you can make your connections - Show alternate services between selected stops - Street address for every stop listed - Favourite routes with customisable names - Include nearby stops with customisable search radius. i.e. include all stops within 100 metres of the selected stops for your trip - Filter services by transport type (bus/train/tram) and/or service name - Direction switcher to view services in the opposite direction - Stop filter so stops in the opposite direction aren't displayed - Select how many days in advance to show service times for, or increase search day by day - Show all services frequenting a stop by selecting the stop from the map - Easy to navigate screen flow - Automatically checks for timetable updates - Gesture support for moving between tabs Compatible with tablets although not officially supported at this stage. Enjoy!
release_text: v1.201 -New Feature: Set an alarm for a departing/arriving service or a transfer between services -Bug Fix: Timetable updater sometimes crashed when checking for a timetable update if no Internet connection was available, download progress bar incorrectly reported progress -Bug Fix: Further minor bug fixes causing various crashes -Improvement: Even smaller timetable -Improvement: Notification to update timetable when it's out of date. Defaulted auto update check to every three days

description: Knobeln is an easy to learn and funny dice game. It is very similar to popular dice games like Farkle, Dice 10000 or Zilch. This game features a single player mode with up to 3 computer controlled opponents and a local multiplayer allowing you to play against up to 3 of your friends on your device. Compare your scores and accomplishments in 3 different leaderboards with other players and collect a bunch of achievments on your way to the top. Test your luck and become the king of Knobeln. description: 1.1 - Fixed a bug where duplicate answers may appear in the quiz. 1.0 - The amino acids and nucleic acids are units of two fundamental molecules of life: proteins and DNA. University and college Introductory Biochemistry courses typically concentrate on understanding the structures and chemical properties of the amino acids and nucleic acids as an integral part of understanding how proteins and DNA function within living cells. The Biochem Euchre Deck was designed as a tool for students to learn the structures and properties of the amino acids of proteins and nucleic acids of DNA. The cards contain nomenclature and structural information, along with some amino acid-specific information. Alpha and beta secondary structure propensity scores are also given and may be used in upper-year courses dealing with protein structure. Quizzes are provided to help the students associate the full names, 3-letter codes, and single-letter codes for the amino acids. Students also learn to associate amino acids with classes based on their chemical properties.

description: When it comes to pizza game, there is nothing quite like the yummy flavors that you taste! With the ratatouille pizza cooking game you can have fun in cooking your very own yummy pizza that professional chefs would be jealous of! Here you will collect all your ingredients and utensils ready for pizza making. Next you will make your dough and roll it out ready for the sauce and ingredients to be placed on it. You also get to cook your sauce by matching the symbols of your ingredients and adding them to the pan one at a time. Once you have cooked and placed your sauce on your pizza base, all you have to do is add the cheese to the top and place your pizza in the oven and watch it transform into the best pizza in the world! So if you love cooking and want to make something special, why not try this free cooking game online and make a mouth-watering pizza! Features: • Collect your ingredients and utensils from the refrigerator and shelves ready for your pizza making! • Add your ingredients together before mixing them with the electric beater! • Kneed your pizza dough with your hands before rolling it out with a rolling pin on the cutting board! • Collect your pizza ingredients from the refrigerator before slicing each one into small pieces to put on your pizza base! • Match the symbols to the symbols on the side to place your ingredients in the pan and cook them! • Slice your cheese into small pieces before adding your cooked sauce ingredients onto the pizza base! • Add the cheese to the top of your pizza before placing it in your oven and cooking it to perfection! • Take your pizza out of the oven and see just how good it really looks!

There are many kinds of cakes all over the world with different recipes. Today we will learn to make muffins with a recipe very popular and attractive. We have to put the necessary amount and mix them in equal proportions and everything will get better. In this game you have to prepare these muffins with a little help. First you have to choose the ingredients and put them in the cart. We need sugar, flour, butter, oil, vanilla extract, a little chocolate and vanilla pudding. After you have chosen all the ingredients have to mix and prepare dough muffins. To do this you have to put in a bowl the sugar, flour, eggs, butter and pudding, then we will mix with a mixer. Then we need to add some water, vanilla extract, chocolate and some milk. After I finished dough should be prepared to put it in special forms for muffins, and then to put it in the oven for a few minutes. After you bake the dough, you must decorate it. To do this you have to choose glaze, pan, pudding and decor items. Thank you for helping us to prepare these muffins and that you have chosen this game, and we invite you to choose and other games for girls that will test your skills in cooking. description: Now available in English and Spanish ***Winner of Children's Technology Review Editor's Choice Award*** ***The National Fire Protection Association (www.nfpa.org) is giving families this FREE deluxe interactive storybook app about fire safety, created by award-winning children’s app developer Cupcake Digital.*** It’s Sparky® the Fire Dog’s birthday, and his doggie friends are throwing a surprise party. In this fun and original tap-and-play storybook app, kids will learn important fire safety skills while joining the excitement of preparing for a surprise birthday party. The story includes bright graphics, surprising animations, interactive learning games, and a hilarious one-of-a-kind sing-along music video. Highlights in Sparky’s Birthday Surprise include: THREE STORYTELLING MODES Just a Book, perfect for quiet reading time, Read & Play and Read To Me in which early-learning reading skills are reinforced with text highlighting and synced narration. FUN BAKED INTO THE STORY Learn about the various parts of a fire truck and decorate Sparky’s birthday cake with highly interactive pages found in the story. LEARNING ACTIVTIES STARRING SPARKY THE FIRE DOG®! Piñata Counting and Sparky Addition mini-games teach kids to count and add in fun new ways, and the Birthday Shapes game helps kids recognize basic shapes. ORIGINAL SING-ALONG MUSIC VIDEO Your child will love singing the “If the Smoke Alarm Sounds” song with Sparky and his tiny flea friends while learning about what to do when they hear the alarm. COLORING PAGES Kids can get creative with coloring pages featuring an array of paint buckets, brushes, colorful spray paints and stickers inspired by the story. SHARED SCREEN TIME The Thinking Corner offers thoughtful questions designed to spark open-ended conversation and reinforce reading comprehension. Hey, parents and caregivers! This app contains gated links to ensure that only adults can access social networking sites, send contact e-mails or visit app stores. We never collect personal data from children and we never use data for behavioral targeting. For more information, or to view our full app privacy policy, please visit www.cupcakedigital.com/appsprivacy.
release_text: Now in English and Spanish (Available as a free upgrade for those who have already downloaded the English-only version).

description: AIM OF THE GAME You must remove a certain amount of rocks of each color, inside a time limit. You can only remove groups of 3 or more adjacent rocks of the same color, with the exception of gray rocks (but you could remove these using the special abilities described below). To get the level completion bonus, besides completing the required color targets, you should remove every remaining group before the time is over. SPECIAL ABILITIES The availability of the special abilities will depend on how much coins you've got. REMOVE ROCK Costs 60 coins. It lets you remove a rock of your choice, of any kind (including gray rocks). SWAP ROCKS Costs 120 coins. It allows you to swap the position of two rocks of your choice, of any kind (including gray rocks). MOVE ROW Costs 140 coins. It allows you to push to the let or to the right a row of rocks. MAGNET Costs 150 coins. You'll be allowed to select a magnet which will atrract all rocks, piling them up to the left or right sides of the screen. SHUFFLE ROCKS Costs 400 coins. This will blow rocks into the air, shuffling them randomly. REMOVE COLOR Costs 1000 coins. This will allow you to remove all existing blocks from a color of your choice (including gray rocks). FEATURES: - Fast gameplay with increasing difficulty. - Easy game mechanics, although developing strategies is required to get far. - Great graphics and visual effects. - 3 different background scenes with day/night theme variations (9 backgrounds in total). - Sound effects and 7 minutes of music. - 6 special abilities to help you progress through the game. - Unlimited levels. - Multilanguage (English, Spanish and Portuguese).

description: A card game called Tower of 21 in which you must rescue the Damsel in distress from the top of her captors tower. Based in a fantasy setting this magical card game will have you climbing rung by rung to rescue a young princess from the tower. We've taken the classic card game of Twenty One or Blackjack and put a few twists in to create a easy to play card game of addition. Playing this card game is as simple as clicking on the stack where you want the next card to go. In order to reach your stranded princess you must make stacks of 21. For each 21 you make the princess will throw down hearts that encourage you to climb up to rescue her. Good luck on your journey brave knight!

Difference Games presents, "Journey into the Wilderness", a completely FREE "What's the Item?" game! If you enjoy Hidden Object or word games then check this out! "What's the Item?" cleverly combines the traditional Hangman word game with the visual searching in Hidden Object. When searching for an item, you flip "Clue Cards" that reveal progressively more letters of the item's name. Think Hangman or Wheel of Fortune, but with hidden objects! "Journey into the Wilderness" contains 8 artistically-crafted levels, filled with items. But wait, there's more! A second way to play, "Logic mode" is also included. In this mode the clues reveal information about the item's shape, location, colors, and name. This helps you narrow down what you are looking for, and the challenge is to find the item using as few clues as possible. Both modes are suitable for kids and adults and are a great workout for your brain cells! The gameplay is also great for kids who are learning reading, word and object association skills. Enjoy!

The "Speaking Alphabet (Russian)" program is intended for training of children under control of parents to learn letters, writing words and reading. It is the convenient training program for joint lessons of parents with children where the adult sets tasks and helps the child to be guided with the world of letters, sounds and syllables. The speaking alphabet will help to remember to the child Russian letters, and their various writing look and sound: upper and lower case, hand-written and printing style. Why we recommend this program: 1 . Color letters draw attention from kids 1.5 years old to preschool children of 7 years old. 2 . Colors allow the child to remember better letters and to learn difference from vowels and consonants. 3 . Opportunity to make words of letters, without possessing skills of the writing. 4 . The child can visually see and compare various writing of the same letter. 5 . Possibility of sound reproduction of the written words, phrases. 6 . Selecting by color of parts of words at listening allows the fastest studing of a pronunciation of syllables and sounds. 7. Two operating modes: the alphabet and syllables depending on landscape or portrait orientation of the screen. Always it is possible to find time to work with the child with your phone or tablet. We give you opportunity to learn letters together. These are your children and it is better to teach them to basic knowledge by yourself! The program works at devices with Adobe AIR support and screen resolution 800x480 and more. If you doubt the device, check it and install Adobe AIR separately. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.adobe.air It is recommended to use tablets with more than 7" the screen for work with syllables in portrait orientation mode.

description: Play Toonia TwinMatch: Mahjongg for kids and match pairs of tiles with cute animals, fruit, vegetables and space monsters with mahjong solitaire educational pairing game for kids & toddlers! Toonia TwinMatch: Mahjongg for kids is based on the traditional Mahjong Solitaire Game with simple gameplay adapted for children. The goal of the game is to match pairs of tiles. Toonia TwinMatch: Mahjongg for kids includes a variety of themes (animals, food, space) and layouts and grants hours of fun for kids and parents! Toonia TwinMatch: Mahjongg for kids is a fantastic educational matching game for your child. It improves children’s cognitive development - including attention, problem solving and memory - in a fun and playful way. It is easy to start, endless to play and includes a lot of fun with really cute illustrations of fruit, vegetables, animals and space monsters. Children can learn about different fruit, vegetables and animals through out the game. How to play Toonia TwinMatch: Mahjongg for kids: The object of the game is to remove all tiles from the board by pairing them. Only free tiles can be paired. A tile is free if it is not covered and can be moved either left or right without being blocked by other tiles. You can turn on the light to help you identify free tiles. Features: • 4 gorgeous themes (fruit, vegetables, bugs, animals, space monsters), 48 different layouts. • Adorable colorful graphics. • Easy-to-learn. • Turn on the light to access an easy mode. • Unlimited replayability. • No written instructions, kid-friendly interface. • No third-party advertising. • Relaxing music. Meet Emma, Laila, Yukiko and Alice, four little beauties for you to bathe, dress up, feed and play with in a Baby Pink Nursery Room, Lovely Baby Crib, Baby Tub and Sunny Kitchen. Play Mommy’s little helper and care for the cutest baby girls in the world! WHAT’S INSIDE • Care for 4 baby girls with different outfits! • Meet Emma and play 23 mini games! • Meet Laila and play 23 mini games! • Meet Yukiko and play 23 mini games! • Meet Alice and play 23 mini games! • Play in 4 different locations: Baby Pink Nursery Room, Lovely Baby Crib, Baby Tub and Sunny Kitchen! • Learn to bathe, dress up, feed and put the baby to bed! • Restart the game and spend daycare time with your favorite sweet baby girl everyday! DON’T LET THE BABY CRY! Tap correct object and find out why baby girl is crying in her little Lovely Baby Crib. Clean the sweet baby girl and you will make her cheerful again! TUB TIME! When your baby is smiling again, you know it’s tub time! Take Baby Shampoo and Baby Sponge, and bathe the sweet baby girl in a Baby Tub. Pop soap bubbles together and wash the bubbly soap foam with warm shower so your baby girl is fresh and clean! TOWEL CUDDLES! After you give sweet baby girl a warm bath, go back to the Baby Pink Nursery Room, dry her off with a soft towel and calm her skin with Baby Oil! FASHION TIME! Now the sweet baby girl is really excited. Comb her hair and dress up the sweet baby girl in style! PORRIDGE TIME! Every sweet baby girl loves fruit puree. Mash apples and bananas, and make some Baby Porridge in a Sunny Kitchen! Feed the baby girl and make her happy! Don’t forget to clean the baby after she has her baby food. WARM UP SOME MILK! Mix Baby Milk Powder with warm water and give the sweet baby girl some warm milk before she goes to sleep. NAP TIME! Sweet baby girl had so much fun with you but now she feels tired after such a long day. Give baby girl a kiss and cover with her favorite blanket before sleep. If the sweet baby girl is quietly sleeping, you did a great job in the sweet baby girl daycare!

Hey kids, it’s baby daycare time! Bathe, dress up, feed and play with the sweet baby girl in her beautiful pink and purple nursery room. Play Mommy and learn how to take care of the little baby. Don’t let the adorable baby girl cry! WHAT’S INSIDE • Play more than 20 mini games and tasks! • Take care of the the baby girl in 4 different locations: Baby Bed, Baby Bath, Nursery and Kitchen! • Learn to bathe, dress up, feed and put a baby to sleep! • Restart the game and spend daycare time with the sweet baby girl everyday! FEATURES • Tap correct object and find out why baby girl is unhappy! • Your baby is dirty – give her a baby bath! • Wash the soft yeallow baby hair with Baby Shampoo! • Give baby girl a sponge bath and play with soap bubbles! • Dry the wet baby with a soft towel and put some Baby Oil! • Comb baby’s hair and dress the baby in sweet and girly style! • Your baby likes fruit puree – mash apples and bananas to make some! • Feed the baby and make her happy! • Mix Baby Milk powder with warm water and give the sweet baby girl some warm milk! • Give baby girl a kiss and cover with her favorite blanket before sleep! • Complete all tasks so that the happy baby could fall asleep!

Get your doctor tools, take care of the kids and make them happy again! One of the best girls games! WHAT’S INSIDE • 3 different emergency situations • 3 kids who need doctor help • More than 10 doctor tools • 11 mini games to clean Alice’s ear • 13 mini games to take care of Devon • 7 mini games to fix Yukiko’s teeth • 1 extra ambulance game Sweet Baby Girl Alice has ear infection Little Alice is very sad. Now Devon needs doctor care. Clean his wounds and put some band-aids. Then use the X-ray scanner and take care of Devon’s broken leg. Poor Yukiko has teeth cavities that need to be fixed Lovely Yukiko kas problems with her teeth. Make her tooth pain go away! Get your dentist tools to clean her teeth and fix cavities. description: 'Tis one of the most popular solitaires ever! In this classic card game, you will be given a deck of 52 standard playing cards, and your task is to move all cards to 4 foundations at the top right corner by suit from A to K. The game starts with 7 tableau piles containing an ascending number of downturned cards from left to right. 1 upturned card is dealt to the top of each tableau pile, then 3 upturned cards will be dealt to the discard pile and the remaining downturned cards become the stock pile, which is placed at the top left corner next to the discard pile. The four foundations will be left empty. Before moving to the foundations, the cards can be temporarily placed on the tableau piles. The topmost card on the discard pile can be moved to a tableau pile if the topmost card on the tableau pile is in alternate color and an immediately higher ranking, for example, the 6 of spades can be moved to the top of the 7 of hearts or the 7 of diamonds. You may also move groups of cards among the tableau piles according to this rule and reveal the remaining downturned cards on them. Only a K or a group starts with a K can fill the position of an empty tableau pile. If the cards on the discard pile cannot be moved, click the stock pile to deal new cards. Click to redeal when all cards in the stock pile are dealt. If you cannot make any moves, you may click the Give Up button at the bottom right corner to quit. The time you have spent and your current score are displayed at the bottom left corner. The faster you finish the game, the higher the time bonus, so complete your task as quickly as possible!

description: Can you accomplish the task given by the Pharaoh? Your goal in this game is to remove all cards on the pyramid by pairing the cards which give a sum of 13 points regardless of their suits. The rankings of the cards are as follows: J has 11 points, Q has 12 points, K has 13 points, A has 1 point, and the remaining cards carry points according to their numbers, for example, a 7 carries 7 points. When the game opens, 28 upturned cards are distributed into 7 rows in the shape of a pyramid. 1 upturned card is dealt to the discard pile under the pyramid, while the remaining downturned cards are put to the left of the discard pile as the stock pile. You can click to remove any pair of cards on the pyramid or the discard pile that gives the sum of 13, for example A and Q, 10 and 3, while a K can be removed by itself. Note that cards on the pyramid cannot be removed when other cards are placing on top of them. When no moves are available, click the stock pile and get a new card. Count your steps wisely, dismiss all cards and win the game!

description: Purge your enemy's naval forces and assert your authority in the sea! Your goal in this game is to sink the opponent's battleships by using torpedoes strategically. When the game starts, your 5 vessels will be placed in the area at the left-hand side, while those of the enemy are on the right. You can arrange the positions of your ships so that they will not be easily located by your rival. You may click the cross button on the right of a ship and drag the ship to a desired location, or click the reverse button on the left of the ship to place it upright. When you are satisfied with your arrangement, click the OK button on the top right of the play areas to begin the game, but bear in mind that your fleet can no longer be moved during the game process. You and the computer will then take turns to bomb each other's warships. The positions of your ships will be displayed to you, but those of the computer are not revealed. You need to deduce the precise locations of the enemy ships according to the directions of their attacks, then click a square in the enemy's play area to shoot. When a torpedo successfully hits an enemy craft, a part of the craft will be on fire. If the bomb misses, a water drop label will appear on the target, indicating the absence of enemy vessels. When all battleships of a side are hit and sunk, the game ends. Declare your victory by launching accurate attacks!

description: Are you able to use disordered letters to compose valid English words without checking the dictionary? In this game you will be given a set of scrambled letter tiles, and your goal is to rearrange them into valid words. You can click and drag the tiles to their suitable positions, then click the Submit button under the tiles to check if the word is correct. If the tiles form a valid word, you will be awarded a score based on the amount of time you have spent. If the word does not exist, 2000 points will be deducted. You may click the Hint button on the left of the Submit button to check the meaning of the hidden word, but you will lose 3000 points if you do so. The timer at the lower right corner will show the remaining time for the current question, and when time is up, you may no longer arrange the tiles and the answer will be shown. Accept the challenge of the classic word game now!

description: Boggle is one of the most liked word games. This Boggle clone brings the same basic concept to your Android phone or tablet. It includes two scoring systems: one that is similar to Boggle and the other that is similar to Scrabble or Words with Friends. The game's objective is to find as many words* as you can from adjoining letters within the game's time limit. The letters can run vertically, horizontally, diagonally, or "zigzag". The more words you find, the higher your score. Word ZigZag is the perfect travel game that will boggle your mind. When playing alone, a player selects the word by tapping the word's 1st letter and gliding his/her finger across the screen over each subsequent letter of the word. Once a word has been selected, the game will determine if it is a valid word*. When playing against friends, players use Word ZigZag as a traditional game board. Players write on paper the valid words that they find on the game board and compare their findings after the time limit. When a game is done, an alphabetical list of all of the valid words* in the game board will appear so the player can have the chance to see words he/she may have missed. Players can adjust many of the game settings: dimensions, time limit, the minimum number of letters a word needs before it is consider valid, etc. Unlike Boggle and many other boggle-like apps, the dimensions of the game board are not restricted to a square: 4x4, 5x5, 6x6. For example, players can adjust the letter grid so it is more rectangular: i.e. 4X6. *(Please note that this version only finds valid American English words.)
release_text: If you like the new features, please post positive feedback on the marketplace. -Added scoring. Users can select one of two scoring systems when starting a new game. The more words, the longer the words, the higher your score will be. -Users can now choose to limit valid words to be those that have 5 letters or more. -Improved letter selection so unwanted letters are not selected. -Improved overall performance. Thanks to all of the users who provided great feedback! Keep it coming!

After the Mini arrived in the doctor's office, we must check the temperature, you have to weigh and especially need to check its pulse to see if he has a normal breath. Introducing the new generation of math learning apps powered by handwritten digit recognition. Handwritten input is the most natural for children, no more multiple choice questions or distraction through keyboard input. With our apps kids can better focus on tasks and get a chance to improve their handwriting. This app was designed to help children to learn and practice multiplication tables. The app features multiplication tables from 1 to 12. At first all problems are presented in a sorted order, later for better learning experience the order is switched to random. You can review where your math skills are weaker, this is especially great for parents who want to see where their child may need help and more practice.

description: "Hurly-Burly" Zoo is a big mess again! How to play: To remove two similar animals click on the cell which is the intersection of two lines on which those animals are located. If the cell is the intersection of three or four animals, they also would be cleaned Four game modes are available: - Levels - 50 logical levels, the main target is to clear all field - Time Attack - check your reaction, how many levels you can finish before time ends - Arcade - each level has to be cleared by particular number of steps - Relax - time limited mode, but time is given for one level Hurly-Burly Zoo is a game for people of all ages. It will help child to train logical thinking and spatial vision. It will help adult to test your reaction and speed of thinking. Amazing graphics and charming soundtrack would not leave anyone indifferent))

description: With the Laugh & Learn™ Shapes & Colors Music Show, babies are encouraged to learn about shapes and colors through interactions with engaging animations, sounds and sing along songs! Baby can tap or tilt the screen to set a learning world in motion! Designed for babies 6 months & up. Features: • Baby can tap or tilt the screen to interact with the on-screen shapes & colors. • Two levels of play to grow with baby: - In Level 1, tap the screen to hear the name of the shape or color - or - tilt the device to make the shapes bounce around the screen. - In Level two, tap the screen to hear the name of the shape or color, tilt the device to make the shapes slide across the screen or play the piano at the bottom of the screen. • Baby can dance along with five sung ditties and two sing along songs! • Teaches shapes, colors, first words and action/reaction. ================================================================================ We recommend parent and child joint media engagement. See our Media Viewing Tips at: http://www.fisher-price.com/en_US/playtime/keepinmind.html End User License Agreement: http://fpconnect.fisher-price.com/dssupdate/EULA/LaughLearn_GoogleEULA.html

description: 1Quest is a roguelike, where you control a young adventurer who pursues an evil blood cult, after they abducts several children, including the princess of the kingdom! You got 7 days before he can start his evil ritual to summon an ancient demon from the sacrificing of the children. Each region of the realm contains some dangerous place where you can find various help and you can choose your own path to choose your rewards. But do not loose time, if you want to save all the children... Fight monsters, grab loot, become more powerful and save the children to prevent the blood cult to summon the demon. This version is a limited version of the full game, with only 4 levels of the Tower of Chaos mode, and without the Campaign. You can buy the full version here Key features: - Turn based RPG - Roguelike: Dying is fun! - 5 races - 18 Differents classes - More than 150 class abilities and spells for characters - More than 100 monsters - 20 Differents dungeons with specific rewards - Magic system based on spell schools and magic affinity for more diversity and replayability

description: Geografia z Bakusiami to niesamowicie wciągająca gra dla całej rodziny, doskonały sposób na naukę poprzez zabawę. Aplikacja swoją prostotą oraz barwną kolorystyką bez wątpienia podbije serce niejednego dziecka. Gra podzielona jest na 5 różnych gier: Flagi, Państwa, Miasta Europy, Miasta Polski oraz Województwa. Każda kategoria posiada poziom łatwy i trudny. Poziom łatwy pozostawia dłuższy czas odpowiedzi na pytanie. Poziom trudny przeznaczony jest dla bardziej doświadczonych graczy, który już poznali odpowiedzi. - gra Flagi, polega na dopasowaniu lub podaniu nazwy prezentowanej flagi, - gra Państwa polega na wskazaniu odpowiedniego państwa na konturowej mapie Europy, - gra Miasta Europy polega na wskazaniu miejsca położenia miejscowości na konturowej mapie Europy, - gra Miasta Polski polega na wskazaniu miejsca położenia miejscowości na mapie Polski, - w grze Województwa gracz ma za zadanie wskazanie odpowiedniego województwa na mapie Polski. Wszystkie wyniki dzieciaków trafiają do ogólnego rankingu gry, dzięki czemu będą mogły między sobą konkurować. Jest to niezastąpiona rozrywka połączona z nauką. Poznawanie flag, krajów i stolic nigdy nie było tak proste. To najlepszy wybór dla rodzica, który dba o rozwój intelektualny swojego dziecka. Gotowi podjąć wyzwanie? Świat geografii z Bakusiami zaprasza do wspólnej zabawy! Geography of Bakusiami is an incredibly addictive game for the whole family, a great way to learn through play. The application for its simplicity and vivid colors without a doubt conquer the heart of many a child. The game is divided into 5 different games: Flags, States, Cities of Europe, Polish Cities and provinces. Each category has a level of easy and difficult. Level easy to leave a long time to answer the question. Difficult level is designed for more experienced players who already know the answers. - Flags game is to fit or specify the name of the presented flag, - Your game is to point to the appropriate state contour map of Europe, - European City game consists in indicating the location of the village on a contour map of Europe, - Polish Town game consists in indicating the location of the town on the map Polish, - Region player in the game is to identify the appropriate province on the map Polish.   All kids go to the general ranking of the game, so you will be able to compete with each other. It is indispensable entertainment combined with science. Get flags, countries and capitals has never been so easy. This is the best choice for a parent who cares about their child's intellectual development.   Ready for the challenge? World geography of Bakusiami invites you to have fun!

app_name: 草生えるｗｗ。スマホに住む謎の生物の育成ゲーム。
description: 「草はえるww」無料で不思議な育成ゲーム！ ある日スマホに送られてきた、一通のメール。 そのメールには、一匹の謎の生物が添付されていた！ アプリ上に表示される「w」を無限に食べ尽くすその生物、人畜無害なかわいいペットか、あるいは…？ 「w」をたくさん食べさせて、生物たちを育てよう！ 次々と増殖する仲間、立ちはだかる敵達、そんな日々の中でときに起こる奇妙な出来事。 その果てに待つ終末とは…！？ とってもゆるキャラな生物たちと過ごす、１ヶ月の物語。 顔文字風味のゆるキャラを、スマホの中で育てよう！ 無料のストーリー進行形育成ゲーム。 【操作説明】 ●画面上にある『w』ボタンをタップして「w（草）」をはやしてゆるキャラを育成しよう。 謎の生物がどんどんたべてくれるよ。 ●ステージを選ぶ アプリのアイコン風のイラストをタップすると≪ボスと戦う≫ことができる！ ボスとの戦闘で勝利すると新しいステージが解放されるぞ！ ●じゃまもの 各ステージには倒したボスが邪魔者として画面に乱入してきます。 アクション要素満載の鬼ごっこゲーム！ 「じゃまもの」を倒すと倒すのにかかった時間によって「w」がもらえます。 ●マンガ レベルアップするごとにマンガが読めるよ ●壁紙 ホーム画面の壁紙を好きなデザインに変更できるぞ！ ※ただいまtwitterでアプリを宣伝すると無料で壁紙がＧＥＴできる！ きもかわ壁紙でホーム画面が華やかに！ キャラクターをタップするといろんな反応を見せてくれます。 お気に入りのキャラクターを見つけよう！ 【wの説明】 wとは、笑いの度合い表す記号のようなもので、「wwwwww」のように、wの個数でどれぐらい面白かったか、どれぐらい気持ちが高揚しているかを柔軟に表現することが可能。ローマ字モードのまま入力する人が多いためか、全角を用いるのが一般的。 笑っていることを意味するwの元は（笑）という記号である。 ■掲載してもらったサイト AndRock http://androck.jp/app/game/casual/kusahaeruww/
release_text: ver1.0.4 画面が真白くなる場合がある不具合があったので修正しました。 ゲーム内容に一切変更ございません。

app_name: くっつき猫カフェ。ネコ店長の育成ゲーム
description: 猫がお客さんに”くっついて”癒す新感覚の動物無料育成ゲーム！ ネコが好きな方、ねこが中毒の方からそうでない方まで 一風変わった猫とのコミュニケーションしてみませんか？ ■次回アップデート情報（6月予定) ・猫とおもちゃで遊べる機能 ・カフェランクの上限を増加 ・店員の追加 ・漫画の追加 ・２階の増築 ●○●○●○●○ゲーム概要●○●○●○●○ どこかの国のどこかの街でひっそりと経営しているネコカフェ。 その猫カフェはなんと『ねこが店員』なのです。 出してくれるメニューもお会計も猫が全てやっています。 ●○●○●○●○ゲーム内容●○●○●○●○ ≪業務マニュアル（遊び方）≫ ①「お客さん」をタップしくっつきます 　　　　　　　　　↓ ②「お客さん」のハートのメーターがたまっていきます 　　　　　　　　　↓ ③ハートのメーターが満タンになったら「お客さん」が満足し帰っていきます 　　　　　　　　　↓ ④タップでお金を回収し、食器を片付けます（お金をタップすると食器は自動的に消えます） ≪体力≫ ・接客をしていくと体力が減ってしまいます ・『休憩部屋』に行くと体力が回復します ・「おやつ」をあげるとさらに早く体力回復します ≪ネコレベル≫ ・接客していくと「人数」に応じてネコレベルがアップして色々な『しぐさ』を覚えます。 ★『しぐさ』について ・しぐさはカフェで店内にいるお客さんすべてを一瞬で満足させることができます ・しぐさをすると体力が普通よりも多く減ってしまいます ≪カフェランク≫ ・接客していくと「人数」に応じてカフェランクが上がります ・ランクが上がると『マンガ』『ネコ店員』が増えていきます ★『ネコ店員』について ・ランクが上がっていくと猫が仲間になります（アップデートで増えていきます） ・うまくローテーションしお店を回していきましょう ★『マンガ』について ランクが上がるごとに１つの物語が増えていきます ≪ショップ≫ ・ねこの「おやつ」、「模様替えアイテム」、「席」、「増築」を購入することができます ★『席』について ・カフェ内の席数を増やすことができます（来店するお客さんの数が増えます） ★『増築』について ・お店を広くすることができます（階数が増えます） ～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～ 暇つぶしにもなる育成ゲーム。しかも無料でかわいいゆるキャラ風味のねこのキャラクターが出てきます。 もちろん動物が好きな方もそうですが、カフェの雰囲気や癒されたいという方、 漫画がよみたいけれど買うお金がない方にもとてもおすすめです。 ちょっと変わったアクションで見ているだけでも楽しめますので暇を持て余してる人にもおすすめです。 ～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～・～

app_name: 学校で触手を飼ってみた。育成ゲーム。
description: あなたは今日から「触手」の飼育係りになりました 無料で不思議。たまにグロくてキモカワな観察育成ゲーム！ キャラクターのきせかえ、アクションも楽しめる！ ハマる要素満載の暇つぶしゲームです。 【ストーリー】 ある日、ボクはワタシは道で（落ちてた）アイツと出会ってしまった。 そして学校の教室でアイツ・・・「触手」を飼育することになった。 ボクのワタシの学校生活は、これからどうなるのだろう。 【画面説明】 ■日誌 ・これまでの触手の成長過程を見ることが出来ます。 ■エサを集める ・連打タップでエサをたくさん集めて触手に食べさせよう！ ■お金を集める ・触手の成長が5日目に突入するとハンド君がもらえます。 　ハンド君を使ってアクションプレイ！お金をたくさん集めよう！ 　ショップでお買い物が出来るようになるよ。 ■売店 ・触手の成長に必要なスイソウが売られています。 （スイソウは触手が大きくなると色々な種類が買えるようになっていきます。） ・エサ2倍速（50個セット）を買うと普通のエサの倍の経験値を触手にあたえる事ができます。 ・バージョンアップしたハンド君を買えます。 （お金を集めることが、どんどん簡単になっていきます。便利です。） ・飼育担当の男の子、女の子アバターのきせかえアイテムが買えます。 （髪型、小物、衣装が買えます。） ■きせかえ ・好きな性別を選んで、自分好みにキャラクターをコーディネートしよう！ （飼育担当の子はプレイヤーのキミと一緒に触手の成長を見守る大切なパートナーです。） キミのためなら、どんなコーディネートも喜んで着てくれるよ。 ■スイソウ ・タッチするとスイソウの中がアップになって、のぞけるよ。 （触手の育成は主にコノ画面で行います。） 【触手の詳しい育成方法】 ～アクションが苦手なアナタにオススメの育て方～ 1.「エサを集めるボタン」で触手のエサをたくさん集めます。とってもシュールです。 　このモードでは3種類のエサを集める事が出来ます。それぞれ見た目以外の違いは 　ありませんので、連打タップしてたくさん集めましょう。 2.エサを集めたらホームに戻ってスイソウをタップしましょう。 　画面下に集めたエサが表示されています。触手に食べさせたいエサをタップしましょう。 　触手が元気に（キモかわいく）喜んでエサを食べてくれます。 これだけ。カンタン。 ～連続タップなんてメンドクサイ！アクションプレイしたい！！あなたにオススメの育て方～ 1.「お金を集めるボタン」で、お金をどんどん集めます。（ただしプレイできるのは触手が5回進化してからです。） 　お金を集めてくれるパートナー「ハンド君」を操作してお金を追いかけましょう。 2.お金を手に入れると売店（ショップ）でエサ2倍速（50個）が購入できます。 　エサ2倍速は通常のエサ1コの2倍分の価値があります。名前のとおりです。 3.　2倍速エサを買ったらホームに戻ってスイソウをタップしましょう。 　画面下に購入したエサが表示されています。タップしましょう。触手が元気に（グロかわいく）喜んでエサを食べてくれます。 どちらの飼育方法を選ぶかはアナタの自由です。 キモくてちょっとカワイイ、なぞの生き物「触手」。しかもグロイ。 育てるとコイツ・・・一体どうなっちゃうんでしょう・・・。 グロイのは苦手だけど・・・でもコワイもの見たさで、つい見ちゃう！！ そして夜に眠れなくなる・・・。ドジっこ天然なアナタに特にオススメします。 グロとかキモイのとか全然こわくねーし！オレ大丈夫だし！！ むしろこんなのカワイクね？そんなアナタにも特にオススメします。 ボクもワタシも大人も触手も なんだかよくわからないケド、クセになるヘンテコゲーム。 androckさんに掲載してもらいました http://androck.jp/app/game/casual/gakkoudeshokushuwokattemita/
release_text: ・日誌の触手の密度がレビューボタンを重なり見えなかったのを修正しました。

description: Play Blackjack 21 Game. Double down, split pairs, get insurance, achieve 21 points and make tons of money. Unlock extra tables to play another great blackjack game. This Blackjack Game is a fun, smart and classic card game. The objective of this Blackjack Game is very simple. You must achieve a number that is greater than the dealers hand, but be careful. Don't exceed 21. Blackjack Game features: * Place your bets 5 to 200 * Play multiple boxes * An ace counts as 1 or 11 * The jack, queen and king are valued as 10 * The cards 2 to 10 are valued at their face value * Dealer takes cards until his total is 17 or greater * Dealer busts when he exceeds 21 * Player busts when he or she exceeds 21 * Double down at 9, 10 or 11 * Split cards of the same value Ready to play the best Blackjack Game? Place your bets!

Your are the only soldier that stands in the way of the enemy and your base. Camp out and snipe the enemy soldiers as they charge your bases. Each kill earns you cash which you can use to upgrade your weapon, call in support, and repair the base. You will be faced off against soldiers carrying grenades, automatic weapons, even trucks and tanks fully equipped with lots of fire power. Build fences, add soldiers to your base, throw grenades and call in air strikes. Hold your ground at each base for 10 days and you will get your chance to move to the next base. Hold off the enemy and save all your bases and you will become a national hero!

Fortunately they're really sweet and they don't cry. So you can easily dress each baby. Try everything. you can even change their mouths and noses. In the end, you decorate the baby room with toys. The triplet babies crow with pleasure! Take a picture of the cutest triplets and send it to your friends. This is a Primavita game. Play this game featuring Thumbelina. Once upon a time there was a little girl. She emerged from a flower and sleeps in a walnut-shell cradle, covered with a blanket of rose leaves. Her name is Thumbelina and her mother loves her very much. On night a frog jumps through the window and he carries away Thumbelina as a bride for his son. The frog puts her on a lily pad so that she can't escape, but her friends, the fish, gnaw through the stalk and a butterfly draws her away over the water, so that the frog can't catch her anymore. Then a stag beetle arrives: he wants to marry Thumbelina, too! He takes her with him, but his friends at home think Thumbelina is a strange creature. "She only has two legs!" That's why he discards Thumbelina in the woods, where she eats nectar from the flowers and the birds sing for her. But then winter comes and the cold arrives: all the birds fly south and all the flowers wither. Thumbelina is feeling very cold and she almost freezes to death. Fortunately a swallow asks if she wants to come with him, sitting on his back, to the sunny south. Thumbelina would love to come along with him, so she flies away with the swallow. When they've arrived in the south, the swallow puts her on a beautiful white flower, in a huge flower field. Thumbelina decides to have a look around and on another flower she sees a handsome boy standing. He's just as tall as she but he wears a crown and has wings! The boy is the flower-fairy prince and when he sees Thumbelina, he immediately falls in love with her. Thumbelina and the prince get married and she also gets a crown and a beautiful pair of white wings. Now she can also fly from flower to flower! In this game you can read the entire story.

developer: Montessori preschool learning games - Kids Academy
description: Kids Academy · ABC Alphabet Phonics best educational app where Baby Toddlers Preschool and Kindergarten children learn English through Montessori play activities: tracing, crosswords, sounds, vocabulary, song, letter spelling blocks, flash cards games Get the Ultimate Alphabet Workbook for Kids! Learning ABCs has never been more fun! The app turns the learning process into what kids love most - a game! HIGHLIGHTS * Left hand and right hand modes of ABC letter formation * Delightful animations to help your children learn alphabet, letters and words in a fun and engaging way * 26 animated flashcards to teach your kids letters and words * 52 flashcard worksheets to teach your children to trace letters * Funny, bright, and creative artwork * Uppercase and lowercase letters, sounds and phonics * Specially designed Parents Area to track your children's progress * Create and edit multiple user profiles * Aligned to Kindergarten Reading Foundation skills of Common Core Standards * Your children can interact with the app at their own pace Set the stage for reading and writing success with this delightfully interactive educational app! Kids will have a blast learning alphabet with Montessori ABC for Kids! PRESS ABOUT US Featured by The Guardian Designed for ages two through five, Montessori ABC for Kids combines the enjoyment of cartoon animations and a simple to use touch interface to help kids learn the alphabet. / AppAdvice.com Montessori ABC for Kids features over 100 different animations corresponding to letters of the alphabet. The illustrations are very clean and help reinforce sounds and words to the respective letters. / Kids Games Club #1 App in Category: Pre-Reading, Vocabulary. / iHeartThisApp

description: - The perfect Manga comic viewer/reader for small devices - Intelligent Zoom & Move - Fully Automated Frame-By-Frame Reading "YOOM manga reader lite" is the perfect Manga comic viewer/reader for small devices such as tablets and smartphones. It's intelligent frame detection technology brings you a perfect manga reading experience. Premium version is also available which comes with full-screen viewing and landscape viewing features. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.air.Yoommanga (1) Zoom In and Out YOOM frame detection engine perform automated zooming in and out. Each frame scrolls smoothly in the playback mode. without manual panning and zooming, You can enjoy large images in the small screen of the mobile phone. (2) Multi-Device, Multi-Screen Resolution YOOM manga supports both tablets and smartphones. It's user interfaces are optimized depending on the screen size and orientation. (3) Automated Frame-By-Frame Reading You can read next page continuously without touching or swiping. YOOM provides you a fully automated frame-by-frame reading. Mirroring your device's display on your TV, you can enjoy a perfect manga reading experience. (4) ZIP Compressed JPEG Images YOOM is specialized in manga images which you have scanned by yourself. Images should use a compressed format such as JPEG or PNG, with a serial number, be packaged as a ZIP/CBZ format file.

description: シンプルなビジネス名刺はもちろん、パーソナルカード、オリジナルトレカ、ペット名刺、ママ友名刺、コスプレ名刺など、シチュエーションに応じたお好みの名刺（カード）を作成＆即ご注文できるアプリです。 　撮影した写真に文字を入れてその場でご注文完了！外出先や旅先でも簡単にご注文いただけます。 　高品質オンデマンド印刷機による名刺印刷に光沢コーティングを施したハイグレード印刷ですので、一般的な名刺より目立つこと間違いなし！しかも最短当日出荷の超スピードでお届け致します。 　詳しくはサポートサイトをご参照下さい。 ※お使いの機種によっては、正常に動作しない場合がございます。また、一部機能に制限が出る可能性がございます。 ※動作を安定させるために、できるだけ他のアプリを終了させた上でご利用下さい。 ※名刺の作成及びご注文には通信環境が必要となります。（Wi-Fi又はLTE推奨） 【名刺印刷料金について】 　○１パック４０枚　８４０円（税・送料込み） 　　　※４０枚の内訳は自由に組み合わせできます。 　○お支払い方法 　　・クレジットカード 　　　（VISA、JCB、Master、AMEX、Dinersなど） 　　・キャリア決済 　　　（ソフトバンク・ａｕ・docomo） 　　・代金引換（佐川急便e-コレクト） 　　　　※代金引換の場合、別途手数料が３１５円加算されます。 ＜安　心＞ 　弊社はプライバシーマーク付与事業者です。大切な個人情報の保護強化・安全管理を徹底致しておりますので、安心してご注文いただけます。 ＜簡　単＞ 　デザインテンプレートを選び、必要な情報を入力いただくと、実際の名刺印刷と同様の仕上がり見本が表示されますので、簡単に作業が進められます。 ＜安　い＞ 　高品質なフルカラー名刺（カード）が１パック４０枚で８４０円（税込）で印刷できます。 　日本全国【送料無料！】　印刷料金２，０００円以上で代引手数料も無料になります。 ＜早　い＞ 　平日の１７時までのご注文分なら【当日発送】いたしますので、最短で翌日には名刺をお届け可能です。 （お届け先によりお届けに必要な日数が異なります。詳しくはサポートサイトをご確認下さい。） ＜バラエティー色々＞ 　１パック４０枚の中身は、１種４０枚でも４０種各１枚でもＯＫですので、違ったデザインや用途の名刺を必要なだけご注文いただけます。 ＜用途の色々＞ 　アプリ内のカメラ機能や写真ライブラリーを使って、簡単にキレイな写真入り名刺が作成できます。 　ちょっとしたグリーティングカードやご挨拶カードとして、また、トレカ風デザインを使えば、簡単にオリジナルチームトレカも作れます。 ＜キレイ＞ 　名刺の印刷は最新のオンデマンド印刷機ゼロックスColor C75 Pressを使用し、キレイ感がアップする光沢コーティングを施したハイグレード印刷です。 ＜選べる２サイズ＞ 　一般的な名刺サイズのレギュラーカード（９１×５５ｍｍ）と、お財布に入れやすいサイズのスモールカード（８５×５１ｍｍ）の2種類をご用意。 　用途に合わせてお選び頂けます。 ＜連　携＞ 　標準の写真ライブラリーから画像を取り込むことができますので、ファイル共有アプリや画像変種アプリなどで連携すれば、 　PCやAndroid端末等で編集した画像を使うことも可能です。 こんな使い方も！ 　○少年野球チームでオリジナルトレカを作成！ 　　　みんなの名刺なら、その場で写真撮影＆編集できますので、簡単にカッコイイトレカが作れます。 　○引越のご挨拶に 　　　ご家族の写真とご挨拶を入れて、お引越の挨拶カードに。 　○招待状やグリーティングカードに 　　　X'masパーティーの招待状や、お誕生日会のご案内カードとして。 　○ペット名刺や趣味の名刺で楽しく 　　　愛犬はもちろん、趣味のクルマや釣りなど、色々なパーソナルカードとしても。 　使い方は無限大！ 　各テンプレートには、それぞれジャンルが設定されておりますが、使い方は自由です。色々な使い方をお試し下さい！ 　今後も発展します！ 　まだまだ分かり難い点や、使い難い点がありますが、どんどんブラッシュアップ＆機能強化を予定していますので、ご意見・ご要望などお気軽にサポートページまでお寄せ下さい。

description: Personal Finance Manager Lite is an easy to use practical App to manage your day to day incomes and expenses. The reports are easy to understand, instantaneous and beautiful with deep financial insight. It has an exciting Award Winning Dashboard as well. Become "smart" by managing your finances right on your "smartphone", Analyze and take informed decisions with the help of charts. Keep track of all your transactions, App will do the book keeping and also you can export/import the data! You can add transactions easily and categorize them quickly, it is also possible to modify or delete them later. Both Free and Paid Versions of the App are always Ad-free. All the data is saved on your phone. You can lock the data with a personal PIN password. The reason i wrote this App is because I wanted a simple and lovely App which helps me to keep track of all my incomes and expenses and show me simple, clean and instantaneous current status and also i should be able to see the past data, both Quantitatively and the Trend of my incomes and expenditures. I designed the Dashboard which exactly tells me this information. I have made sure to give total control over the duration to observe/analyze the data, because a picture is worth a thousand words! For me Ads is a BIG NO, so i have not given any Ads for both Free and Paid versions of the App even if it could have helped me financially, In fact i seriously have the opinion that Financial Apps which maintains your data locally should be secure and not connect to Internet(unless it needs to get latest information something like stock market data) so i have made sure this App does not need to connect to the INTERNET. Currently the App maintains a Single Account with Single Currency. It captures the necessary and critical information while you are adding the transaction. I have tried to keep the interface as simple as possible. This product has evolved over many iterations of careful design, planning and testing stages. Still many new features are planned in the road-map, please give your feedback and feature requests to keep encouraging us! Features(and their availability in Free-F and Paid-P flavors): - Ad-Free (both in Free & Paid) - Add, Modify or Delete Income and Expense Transactions (both in F & P) - Assign categories and sub-categories (both in F & P) - Award Winning Dashboard, shows transactions Quantitatively and with Trend (both in F & P) - Drill/Dig through your Categories to Sub Categories with their trend (both in F & P) - Balance Summary and Classic views (both in F & P) - Search for transactions in their description text (both in F & P) - Quickly try out the app by installing sample data, there is option to delete as well (both in F & P) - Contextual Help on every screen (both in F & P) - Manage categories by adding new Categories or Sub Categories (Only Paid) - Backup and Restore feature: (Only Paid) - Change the look and feel of the App by customizing the App color (Only Paid) - Add Recurring Transactions (Only Paid) - Lock Feature (Only Paid) - Instantaneous Charts for Day, Week, Month, Year and Custom Durations (both in F & P) Permissions: Storage: Reason export/import file for Backup (Only in Paid App) No Permission is required for Free App since Export/Import is disabled.(For Free App) Needs latest Adobe AIR. Pls Note: For a pleasant and exciting experience of the App: We would recommend a minimum screen size of 480x800 and with a 1GHz processor. Tested on Samsung Galaxy S & S3 it works like a charm!. The App can be used as a finance manager, expense manager, finance management, expense tracker, money manager, savings tracker, saving, finance, personal finance, personal money, spending tracker, daily expense, income tracker, mobile banking, expense log, household finance, financial planner, accounting software, cash register, organizer, money, saver, easy money, pocket money, book keeping, mobile expense tracker, mobile money, daily expense tracking and more!

description: It's an old legend that who finish the jewels trick will gain all the jewels and become rich! This is a simple, yet quite polished and fun match-3 puzzle game, which is still addicting as ever! Do try it out! developer: Media Applications Technologies for the BBC
description: BBC Media Player works with BBC websites and applications to provide video and audio playback on your Android device. Once you have downloaded this application, continue to use your favourite BBC websites and apps on your Android device as normal. Whenever you play any video or audio the BBC Media Player will launch and handle playback of the content. ===== Users of Samsung Galaxy devices - especially the S5 and Note 4 - may be unable to play content after the upgrade to Android Lollipop (5.x), and may find that the BBC Media Player app crashes after a few seconds. This was due to a bug in the Samsung firmware which has now been fixed. Please ensure you update to the latest version of firmware for your device (eg, for the Galaxy S5 the version must be at least G900FXXU1BOC7). ===== Permissions ----------- You may notice that when you install the app it asks you for permission to access your phone's network communication, phone calls, and system tools. These are standard Android app permissions that are defined by the Google Android platform. The 3 permissions the BBC Media Player app asks to use are: • Network Communication - full internet access. Granting this permission provides the BBC Media Player app with access to the internet so it can play programmes. • Phone Calls - read phone state and identity. Granting this permission provides the BBC Media Player app with phone communication status and notifies the application if the phone rings or a phone call is in progress. We only use this permission to ensure that the BBC Media Player pauses if you receive a phone call and temporarily reduces its audio when you receive a txt message while watching a programme. The BBC Media Player app does not access or store any personal information, phone numbers or IMEI numbers. • System tools - preventing phone from sleeping, retrieve running applications. Granting this permission provides the BBC Media Player app with the ability to prevent the phone going to sleep when you are watching a programme.
release_text: We've worked with Adobe to fix the problems with playing audio content in the app. We're sorry for the inconvenience this has caused. Also in this update: - Audio from other apps is only stopped when a programme is about to play - The app exits automatically if audio has been buffering in the background for more than 30 seconds

description: Classic arcade action with fresh visuals! NOTE: This game is still very much a work in progress! See the bottom of this description for planned future releases! This is the ad free version of Missile Defense. Find the ad supported, free version in the Android Market. Take the reigns as Supreme Commander of your military forces, tasked with holding off the complete and utter destruction of your planet. As the last line of defense, you must defend the planet from endless waves of missiles that steadily increase in numbers and speed. Tap the screen to trigger explosions in front of inbound missiles in order to destroy them before they destroy the 3 major population centers located on the surface of the planet. Press your device's option button for options and to pause the game. You can also press the back button in order to pause. This game is based off of open source code and is still a work in progress. description: ADD / ADHD: Keeping on Track If you need help with staying on task this app will do the trick. ADD / ADHD :Keeping on track is a short - term reminder system. The app is designed to help those with ADD / ADHD to focus on the task at hand. ADD / ADHD: Keeping on Track allows the user to set verbal reminders and notifications on their android powered device. Using ADD / ADHD: Keeping on Track is simple and straightforward. 1. Add your desired reminder. This is the reminder that will be played or spoken to you. 2. In the Repeat Every field, set the interval at which you wish to receive your notification. (Ex. If you set to 5 minutes, you will receive your notification every 5 minutes) . 3. Set your End time in the End After field. Your notification will stop once the End After time is complete. 4. The options field contains your choice of what type of notification you wish to receive. Turning the voice option on allows your device to speak the notification to you. Vibration supported devices can use the vibrate setting. By turning on the notification sound, you will receive an alert with your notification. 5. Press the test button to test your current settings. If everything is satisfactory, press start. 6. You can pause your notification by pressing the pause button. THIS ONLY PAUSES THE NOTIFICATIONS AND NOT THE END TIME. You can press the stop button at any time to stop your notification.

description: Smart BT - Auto Bluetooth will help you to save battery. Automatically enable and disable bluetooth according to the rules that you will set. You can forget about to turn on your bluetooth every time you will sit in your car. Setup rules using Smart BT and let it enable automatically your bluetooth. # Managed by calls: Turns on bluetooth upon incoming and outgoing calls. Turns off Bluetooth when call ends # Managed by shake: It allows you to turn on or off the bluetooth shaking the phone. Handy in case you need bluetooth in moments that are not managed by the rules you have set. # Managed by timers: It allows you to set one or more periods of the day in which Smart BT will automatically turn on and off bluetooth. If it is also active "Auto bluetooth upon calls" then Smart BT - Auto Bluetooth will manage bluetooth upon incoming and outgoing calls but only during the timers you set. # Managed by SMS: If enabled, when you receive a text message, you will see a notification in the status bar and if it is accepted Smart BT will wait up to 15 seconds for a bluetooth connection. If an connecction is established the SMS will be read over bluetooth device. If there arent available devices then SMS will be read using phone speakers. You can set shake SMS re-repeat. NOTE: To read the SMS, Smart BT uses Google output synthesis (Text-to-Speech). Available settings: - Delay Bluetooth turning off - Say caller name - Set speakers volume for caller name or read sms - Auto answer incoming calls. You can choose how many seconds Smart BT have to wait before to auto answer. - Auto answer to any calls or only for choosen contacts - Shake to re-read sms - Sticky icon - to know when smart bt is enable and what it is managing - Status bar bluetooth notifications - Toast bluetooth notifications - Main page info - info to let you know what Smart BT is managing Available Languages: English (default), Italian Your devices must be paired with your phone to let auto bluetooth connect to them

description: A simple set of emissivity tables for anyone performing infra-red temperature measurements or Infrared Thermography. A very handy tool for anyone with a FLIR, Fluke or other infrared camera/thermometer. When you need to adjust with an emissivity value- simply open the quick launch app and look up the value. No internet connection is required. You can also search for a material by typing in the first letters of the material type- the app will begin filtering results immediately. Your reports will be more accurate than ever when adjusted with the correct value. Home, business, equipment, roof, mould and other inspections all need adjustment, but not all imagers have the correct value pre-installed. Virtually all infrared camera (and some infrared thermometers) allow for manual emissivity adjustment; simply input the number and continue with your inspection. Take your inspections to a more professional level by compensating each and every one of your images. Your customers will thank you.
release_text: This application has undergone a complete re-design in version 3.0. You can now search for generic values or very specific values. Specific values are separated in two groups- Metals vs Non-Metals. All materials can be filtered by typing the name of the substance you seek- results will filter automatically. Users/comments: Thanks for the feedback Yann, Nancy, Senkusha. Thanks to you the entire application was rebuilt. The tables were completely abandoned in favor of the new interface.

description: OSCE Cardiac Examination Checklist is a free and simple to use program to ensure a complete and thorough cardiac examination. Great for Medical students, and those who examine them. Instructions: 1. When your examinee is ready, press the "Start Examination Button" 2. When you observe your examinee perform the relevant task, simply click the checkbox 3. When your examinee has indicated the conclusion of the examination, click the "Finish Examination" button. 4. Simply scroll up and report back what was missed! I hope you find this program useful! I welcome and suggestions or improvements. Includes content from Talley and O'Connor, Oxford Handbook of Clinical medicine, and a (small) pinch of experience!

description: Old Time Radio Shows OTR FlashOTR provides access to ALL shows in the our database. NO extra charges. The oldtime radio era, sometimes referred to as the Golden Age of Radio, refers to a period of radio programming in the United States lasting from the early 1920s until the 1950s, when television superseded radio as the medium of choice for programming and radio shifted to playing popular music. During this period, when radio was dominant and filled with a variety of formats and genres, people regularly tuned into their favorite radio programs. Now with FlashOTR, we can do that again. If you dont see it, let us know and we will try to ad it to the database. Write and listen is an educational app that lets you feel what we write. This application can be used in many ways. It may be useful for those who are unable to speak, can then use the device to communicate, for children who want to learn to write and can then listen to what you have written, it can be helpful to anyone who wants to listen to the pronunciation of a word in different languages. This is possible because the app you can change the language in which the word is read, there are languages Italian, English, French, Spanish, German, Dutch, Czech, Polish with different pronunciations depending on the country selected. "Write and read", "write, and repeat", "write and listen", "Show and repeats" is an informative and allows you to store the text written so that you can select and repeat words or phrases recorded at any time. This application can be considered also as an educational game for children, who enjoy writing letters of the alphabet, numbers, words, phrases and listen to what they have posted. The app is very easy to use and very intuitive buttons. With this simple voice synthesizer Android you can say anything to our Android motor TTS (text-to-speech). Attention! The synthesizer's voice is the same as that installed on your phone and you cannot change it, so avoid negative reviews due to this! For any problem, advice or information about your application, you can email me via email, I'll be happy to answer you, thank you.

This app is a must have for everyday use. It allows you to take pictures of yourself, your loved one, your baby or anybody or anything you choose at a time interval and watch them on your screen at a fast pace. You can take a picture of yourself every day all-year and then replay the images all at once. Photos taken are played in sequence regardless of your usual use of your camera outside this app. You can replay pictures manually or as a slideshow. You can also adjust the playback speed. When you take a picture it allows you to accept or reject the image taken. Once accepted it gets stored in a database in your phone independent of your photo gallery, so you can always watch your images in the sequence they were taken. You can also review them in the gallery. Some phones need to be powered off then restarted to move pictures into gallery. To see pictures in full quality, we recommend that you review them on your computer monitor after you sync your device. Since screen sizes differ there is an option to correct for different displays. The picture quality is that of the device. If you uninstall the program and re-install it you will start a new series of pictures. You will not lose your old series. It will remain on your phone. We strongly recommend to always back-up your photos to a computer however. Disclaimer: The developer is not liable for any lost images. Always backup your phone or tablet to a PC.

description: A music theory app for everyone. 'Music Theory - Chords in Keys' is a music theory app that will train you to think your way around musical keys. You will learn what all the three and four note chords are within all 12 major, natural minor, harmonic minor and melodic minor scales - an extremely useful skill for any musician! After installing music theory app 'Music Theory - Chords in Keys', choose the scale that you would like to work on (major, natural minor, harmonic minor, melodic minor) and the chord types (triads or sevenths). The app will then display a key and a Roman numeral chord number; you then have to work out what the chord within your chosen scale. This music theory app will also display the notes within each chord and the notes within each scale, allowing you to test your musical knowledge even further, or assist you in working out the correct answers. This latest version also offers a 'Play chord' option so you can here the chord you are being tested on. The tonic chord of the current scale is played, followed by the chord in question, followed by the tonic chord again. This way you know only learn music theory but also develop your aural skills at the same time. A summary of all the relevant music theory of chords within each of the scales is included in the help pages. With regular use of this music theory app you will know what all the fundamental three and four note chords are in each of the four scales, in all keys, and you will be a better musician because of it. - No ads - Low cost - No gimmicks - Simple clear layout - No music-reading skills required! This music theory app is ideal for guitarists, pianist, brass players, wind players, strings players, singers and just about anyone that would like to improve their knowledge of music theory, chords and keys; whether you play rock, pop, jazz or classical music. 'Music Theory - Chords in Keys' is a music theory app created by guitarist and music educator Stuart Bahn to help music students improve their musical knowledge even whilst away from their instruments. Download music theory app 'Music Theory - Chords in Keys' now make your move towards music theory mastery. MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: If you are in any way dissatisfied with this app, contact us within 24 hours of purchase for an immediate refund. This music theory app is designed to run on all Android smartphones. Because there are nearly 2000 different Android devices in the world, we can't test them all! If you do have a technical problem with your device, please don't leave a bad review, it's far more useful for all of us if you just let us know. We'll then do our best to address it asap or refund your payment. Thanks and happy learning.

description: OBD-2 Scanner PID Repair (An automotive repair series APP) This APP is a unique piece of software meant to help you get the most out of your scan tool. Packed with information on all the scan tool parameters or PIDs. The APP allows you to choose the specific PID or parameter from a list. Here are the PIDs covered: Number of DTCs, CODE that caused FF, FUEL STATUS, ENGINE LOAD, ECT (engine coolant temperature), FUEL TRIMS, FRP (fuel rail pressure), MAP (Manifold Air Pressure), RPM (engine revolutions), VSS (Vehicle Speed Sensor), Ignition Timing Advance), IAT (Intake Air Temperature), MAF (Mass Air Flow), TPS (Obsolute Throttle Position), Commanded Air Status, O2 Sensor Location, STFT (Lambda Fuel Trims), OBD-2 Requirements, PTO/AUX INPUT STATUS, TIME SINCE ENGINE STARTED, DISTANCE TRAVELED WITH CEL ON, FUEL RAIL PRESSURE with MAP, AFR (Air Fuel Ratio Sensor), Commanded EGR, EGR ERROR, Commanded EVAP PURGE, # WARM UPS SINCE CODE CLEARED, Fuel Level Input, DISTANCE SINCE CODE WERE CLEARED, EVAP FUEL VAPOR PRESSURE, BARO (Barometric Pressure Sensor), AFR (Signal), CONVERTER TEMPERATURE, MONITOR STATUS (ENABLED/COMPLETED), VOLTAGE POWER/ECM POWER, ABSOLUTE LOAD FACTOR, COMMANDED EQUIVALENCE RATIO, RELATIVE THROTTLE POSITION, AMBIENT AIR TEMPERATURE, ABSOLUTE THROTTLE POSITION B C D E F, (TAC) COMMANDED THROTTLE ACTUATOR, TIME RUN WITH CEL/MIL ON, TIME SINCE CODE CLEARED Then once the PID is chosen you get an actual real-life description of the parameter and how you can use it. Keep scrolling through the list until you're satisfied with the knowledge. THEN.... you get even more.... There are three specific OBD-2 scan tool parameter buttons, the Video Helper, YouTube Helper and Audio Helper. These buttons work in conjunction with the PID that was chosen before. It is all automatic. By pressing the "Video Helper" button you get access to a set of PID specific videos dealing with your OBD-2 scanner parameter. NOTE: The "Video Helper" button works with larger Tablet Displays and Phones. May not work on smaller phones. The "YouTube Helper" does work with most phones. Then, if you're not satisfied and depending on the display option that you have, you can go to the "YouTube Helper" button, which is geared to display one of our automotive video properties. All YouTube videos shown here are the property of the author, Mandy Concepcion - Automotive Diagnostics and Publishing and not from any other non-approved source. So the information is accurate and taken from our YouTube channel "ADPTraining". Finally, for those with extremely small phone resources you get an "Audio Helper" button, which only displays audio and meant for small memory devices. (note: this option is coming soon). With the OBD-2 Scanner PID Repair APP you're set to get the most out of your CODE-READER or scan tool. Authored by Mandy Concepcion NOTE: This APP works fine on phones and tablets with larger screens.

description: SRS-Airbag Code Encyclopedia (Automotive) (An Automotive SRS-Airbag Repair APP) This APP has taken years of research to compile and thousands of field work hours to prove. This APP is based on similar software and book products by the same author. It cover the vast majority of SRS-supplemental restraint systems diagnostic fault codes. There are thousands of codes available both OBD-2 and OBD-1, or the so called blink codes. These blink codes are still used by many manufacturers. You also get "How to access SRS codes" in most cases without a scan tool. A good portion of vehicles do not need a scan tool to access airbag codes. Often time these procedures are no easy to find, for obvious reasons. The idea is to be able to diagnose your SRS-Airbag system without a scanner. If you can fix one issue with a car, this APP pays for itself a thousand times over. Here's the coverage that you get: Domestic coverage for General Motors, FORD/Lincoln/Mercury and All Chrysler/Dodge group vehicles (including Chrysler Imports). Asian coverage for Acura/Honda, Isuzu/Mazda/Subaru, Infinity/Nissan, Kia/Hyundai/Mitsubishi and Lexus/Toyota. By Mandy Concepcion Note: This APP run fine on Android Phones and Tablets with larger screen.
