description: 100% Offline guide to Crete My Crete Guide is the most complete and updated guide to the island of Crete. It allows users to explore known and unknown aspects of the island according to their own preferences. Features : ★ Offline application, no roaming charges! ★ 100% offline map of Crete ★ Languages: Greek, English, Russian ★ More than 40 categories of interest (beaches, gorges, historical monuments, natural monuments, forests, waterfalls, archaeological sites, monasteries, caves, etc.) ★ More than 2.000 landmarks with texts and photos ★ Personalized information through customization filters ★ Navigator that guides you to a selected point of interest ★ Guides for the 6 major cities of Crete (Heraklion Guide, Chania Guide, Rethymnon Guide, Agios Nikolaos Guide, Sitia Guide, Ierapetra Guide) ★ Guide with city trails and canyons ★ The entire E4 European trail in Crete included ★ Shows points of interest around the user ★ Reviews and user ratings ★ Create personal points of interest ★ Weather forecast When there is internet connection, these options are also available: ★ Change to map with great precision ★ For each point of interest, the user can download more photos (more than 12.000 overall) ★ Propose to our development team new points of interest by adding your own information and photos ★ Download more reviews and ratings from other users Installation After the initial installation of the software, you need to download all required files. Because data size is ~200MB, we recommend: ✓ Get connected to a wi-fi ✓ Make sure you have the required free space on your device ✓ Ensure that your battery is not drained or plug the device on power. While running navigation with GPS, we recommend that the device is connected to the power of your car. (iOS device? Go to https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/my-crete-guide/id950116030 )

description: Challenge your brain with Android MasterMind. MasterMind is a classic game of logic in which your objective is to find the code of four colored pegs that the Android has selected at random. Repeated colors are allowed. You have ten chances to crack the code. To make a guess repeatedly tap the pegs on the bottom panel and press ENTER. After each guess the Android places key pegs as follows: - A red peg for each correct color in the correct position. - A white peg for each correct color in the wrong position. - No key pegs indicate a color is not in the code. Test your skills in 3 difficulty levels: - Easy (6 colors) - Medium (7 colors) - Difficult (8 colors). To start the game select the number of colors you would like to play with. Hope you enjoy the game!

If you love basketball and playing flick games, then get your finger at the ready and see how many balls you can get in the net! Are you ready? Take on the challenging arcade mode. Or sudden death if your just after a quick play? Why not try the basketball timed game to see what score you can get in 60 seconds? Get all as many basketballs in the net as possible.

Switch weapons from sidewinders, missiles, carpet bombs and machine guns to destroy the opposing enemy jets and show you have air superiority. Be the master of the skies and the most skilled jet pilot ever to engage in a dogfight.

Parking games are great practice for the real thing and you may consider yourself a parking master... but have you ever parked a 4x4 Jeep? Cast aside ordinary cars and get behind the wheel of our 4x4 Jeep Simulation Game as you attempt to park and guide it through the trickiest situations. Drive between obstacles and park your 4x4 Jeep perfectly in the parking spot to pass a level and increase your skill as a parking game but watch out, one wrong turn and this parking game is over.

Babymecum is the application to query pediatric medication # 1 in Spain for iPhone / iPad, with over 75,000 downloads and more than 500 user reviews (both parents and physicians), with an average of 4.5 / 5 points. This application is a tool that can quickly check the dose most commonly used pediatric medications. description: Do you think you can leave your mark on every continent? Well, the locals in far away lands aren’t always happy with your free attitude towards going to the toilet. So it’s important to stay alert at all times. WHAT'S INSIDE There are 7 continents (levels) to complete packed with shocking surprises and challenges that include: ★ Taking a dump in the gardens of the White House. ★ Sneaking into The Queen's private bathroom in Buckingham Palace ★ Visiting the ancient ruins of Machu Picchu to honour the ancient Incas ★ Leaving an American tribute in an Asian rice field. ★ Fertilising the dry, stubborn soil of Africa ★ Diving in the Great Barrier Reef to leave some American fish food ★ Interfering with global warming researchers in Antarctica by 'changing the temperature' of their equipment Possibly a bit crude? Well yes, but it's also progressively challenging and rewarding. We guarantee you won't have played a game like this before! FEATURES ★ High resolution graphics ★ Unique music and sound effects for each level ★ Humorous gameplay ★ Carefully designed 'super poo' power ups Let us know what you think! description: Introducing Ultimate Mini Golf - the fun, addictive and challenging game of golf! Do you love mini golf but never get the time to play it? We understand, so we have made the Ultimate Mini Golf application - mini golf at your fingertips! Choose the course that you would like to play, set the ball’s target and putt! Can you master the hole? Enter the spooky, mysterious graveyard; brave the harsh desert; putt through thick snow and go retro in the cartoon level. Each course contains 9 difficult holes that you must direct the ball into! Enter the curious worlds of mini golf as you aim to get the hole in as little shots as possible. Finally you are able to play mini golf on your sofa, in the car or even at 30,000 feet; the possibilities are endless! In this exciting game, you can putt in amazing, 3D worlds. There are 9 holes to every course - so you will never run out of exciting gameplay! However, it is not as easy as it seems as there are dozens of obstacles that block your path, you will have to maneuver around them to get the hole! Enter the vibrant worlds including the desert, graveyard, snow,castle and cartoon levels, with 9 holes to complete on each. Ultimate Mini Golf will keep you entertained for hours on end with addictive gameplay and challenging obstacles to bypass. Tap to angle your shot and select the power - then tap once more to putt - will you get a hole in one? Beware as golf skills may not be so helpful in this virtual world - you must use advanced tactics and skillful precision to get the best from your shot. Ultimate Mini Golf is addictive and fun to play - the whole family will love mini golf with a modern twist! Experience Ultimate Mini Golf today! Features - Amazing 3D graphics that pop from the screen - Camera overview of each hole - Addictive yet challenging gameplay - 5 varying courses to explore and master! - 9 holes to each course! - Challenging obstacles to pass!

description: ******** IF YOU NEED HELP SETTING UP THE APPLICATION, EMAIL ME ******** Database Tool allows users to easily view and query database tables. Use of this app requires the upload of a web services written in PHP to your server. This gives an extra layer of security since you will not be forced to allow remote connections to your database, like the other apps on the Android Market require. This application does not directly allow you to query. Instead, it assembles queries based on your preferences. It allows you to sort and search columns. View the screenshots for more examples. Based on the popularity of this app, I may come out with a professional version that allows for custom queries, which would be very useful when you need to join tables. As of now, the Tool is only compatible with MySQL databases. There are plans for MSSQL compatibility in the future as well. You can download the PHP code at : https://sites.google.com/site/jstn455/databaseviewer Directions for getting the application to work are as follows: Step 1: Download .zip or .tgz file from https://sites.google.com/site/jstn455/databaseviewer Step 2: Extract the folder (unzip or tar -zxvf "filename.tgz") Step 3: Transfer the directory via FTP client into your public html folder Step 4: Confirm the web address through your browser. There should be a confirmation message.If you transferred the directory to the root public html file, it should be http://yoursite.com/mysql-tool Step 5: Go into the settings.php file in a text editor and fill out lines 14-18 For $password, you could use any password you want. It does not have to be your database password, and as a precaution it should not be your database password. Step 6: Download the Android application Step 7: Add the database to your application. Match the password from your settings.php file to the password field in the application If you prefer extra security, you can use also set up an htaccess authentication for the directory. The app will prompt you for your username and password. Features: Single Table viewing Multiple column searching Sorting Paginated Data view Export to CSV MySQL Database Viewing

description: Golf Shot Tracker Pro is a simple-to-use, full-featured Golf GPS system, including GPS Maps, 5 player scorecard, Shot Tracking, and Stats all in one app! This version of the app gives you a 30 day unlimited trial - you get access to all features of the paid version for 30 days. After your trial period ends, ads will be shown in the app and you will not have access to golf stats. For full access, simply purchase the paid version of the app for a small one time cost. Golf Shot Tracker Pro will help you keep track of your stats and shots with an easy to use interface as you keep your score and record your golf shots. Only track as many shots as you want and only the stats that matter to you. From a single screen, you can add strokes, putts, Fairway hit, GIR, penalty strokes, tee direction, and see the distance to the Front, Center, and Back of the green. A simple tap of a button will bring up an overview map of the hole or your scorecard. This Golf GPS app is the only app you need on the golf course! We have over 25,000 courses mapped in our course catalog - search by name, location or nearby to find your favorite courses. Can't find your course? Using your PC and our easy to use course mapper, mapping your favorite course will only take 15-20 minutes at http://www.GolfShotTracker.net If you have any issues registering your trial or with the app - send us an email at: LiteDroidDevelopment@gmail.com Golf Shot Tracker Pro features: * Distance to the front, center, and back of each green - a true Golf GPS * Keep your score and track your putts, greens, and fairways - see them visually on your scorecard * View satellite maps of the hole and get accurate distance to any point on the course * View the map of the green to get an accurate target distance * Email your scorecard when you are done with your round * Track your golf shots to find your average distance for each club * Compile your golf stats for greens in regulation, fairways, putts and more! * Backup your data - rounds, clubs, stats, and courses can be saved to the SD card for later restore. Use Golf Shot Tracker Pro Golf GPS and start seeing lower scores today!

description: ((You must have Zooper Widgets Pro installed to use this skin)) This theme works perfectly on Nova Launcher Prime and should work with some other launchers as well. Use the "THEME INSTALLER". This should prevent you from having to email me for the APK and should also allow you to perform proper updates via the Play Store. After you download the theme, find the "Monday theme installer" in your app drawer and click it. :-) Icons: http://www.mediafire.com/download/bsh1qshs86csahu/metrostation_icons.zip TUTORIAL: Theme installer.. After downloading the theme, go into your application drawer and find the "Monday theme installer". Open it and click install. Nova setup.. Set the grid size to 12x4 Make sure there are 0 margins Hide the status bar (this is located under "look and feel") Hide the dock Set swipe up action to app drawer Set swipe down action to show notifications Set homescreen count to 1 Check "resize all widgets" Applying the theme.. Longpress your home screen and click "widgets" Scroll down to "zooper widget pro" and click it For status bar and search bar, apply in a 4x1 grid For weather apply in a 4x2 grid For notifications and dock apply in a 4x4 grid Follow me on Google + for updates and new themes that Im working on. https://plus.google.com/112162095736133226513/posts If you have any problems or questions please email me rather than post a comment on here. Thank you.

description: Flying Car Simulator 3D 2014 Extreme Car Driving 3D is a real physics engine game. If you like Simulator Games and drifting, try it. Explore the mini world and drift a lot. You can turn off ABS, TC, ESP. Damage the other vehicles on the streets. Features: - Massive free world or collect breakfast missions - Proven and amazing HD quality with super graphics - Real simulation of skidmarks and tire smokes - Custimizable classic car - Custimize ABS, TC, ESP, Engine, Drift, Steering Wheel, Brake - Easy to use controls and nostalgic interface - Real time dynamic physics and reflections - Dynamic Engine, gear and vehicle sounds - This is game is extremely optimized and comes with very small size and HD quality. We made this game for classic car, simulation, drift lovers. Nice gaming in 2014

Schlager Music Radio is the best, free and personalized radio service that plays the best Schlager music you love. You can even customize and create your favorite radio station list. If you love Schlager music, you are in a treat. Install and run this app now, it won't disappoint you. Features: There are more than 50 radio stations. You can select your favorite stations and add them in a separate list You can also remove stations from your favorite list Long press any radio station to add to favorite. Also long press to delete any station from the favorite list. High quality music Even a slow internet speed is enough to run the radio station.
release_text: Bug fix. UI update. New feature added.

description: In the post-apocalyptic era, zombies are energized by old nuclear reactors. They creep out of the ground where nuclear energy and radiation combine. Their intent is to eat the survivors and dominate the new world order. Your mission is to disable the remaining reactors and eradicate zombies. Drop in from your helicopter to rescue soldiers who are pinned down at a military base barricaded with makeshift barbed wire, rotten fences, and all manner of post apocalypse garbage. Take a wild ride through fields littered with zombies, but stay in your jeep or armored personnel carrier when you can, it's safer that way! Scavenge for weapons in a ruined city, find the classic crowbar or nail bat, take out more zombies on foot or take up a sharp shooter position up high. Tighten your seatbelt for a final showdown with zombies protecting a nuclear reactor, sneak in with dynamite and take it out, destroy their power source to save the world! • zombies : rotten businessman, ragged ann, surgeon, police officer • vehicles : jeeps, armored personnel carrier, helicopter, spare tire • explosive dynamite to take out towers and nuclear reactor • weapons : crowbar, golf club, fire axe, gun, nail bat, tire • rescue soldiers pinned down in military base

description: Mission : Engage enemy in low altitude close quarter combat and disable his ability to make war. Fly your drone covertly through enemy airspace and take out targets. Be cautious not to take damage as enemy desires our drone technology. Good luck.

description: 안녕하세요 용사님! 내손안에 메이플, 메이플 핸즈 입니다! 메이플 핸즈가 드디어 2.0으로 새롭게 개선이 되었습니다. 많은 부분들이 개선이 된 만큼 이용에 도움이 될만한 부분들을 적어보았어요! 용사님들 이용에 참고 부탁 드립니다! ==== 메이플 핸즈에서는 다음의 기능을 제공합니다! ==== 1. 온라인 메이플스토리와 연동되는 “몬스터라이프” 2. 온라인 메이플스토리와 연동되는 “메이플톡” 채팅 (1:1, 그룹, 친구, 길드대화 지원) 3. 온라인 메이플스토리의 최신 소식을 가장 빠르게 접할 수 있는 메뉴 ==== 다음의 내용이 메이플 핸즈 2.0을 통해서 개편 되었습니다! ==== 1. 메이플 핸즈의 디자인이 새롭게 개편되었습니다. - 더욱 유저 친화적이고 세련된 디자인과 구성으로 개선하였습니다. - 메인 디자인을 심플하게 변경하여 한눈에 원하는 메뉴를 찾을 수 있게 개편하였습니다. - 캐릭터의 배경을 쓸어 넘기면 배경이 바뀝니다. - 공식 아이콘도 변경이 되었습니다. 메이플 핸즈의 마스코트는 묵직한 예티와 수다쟁이 페페 입니다! 2. 캐릭터 정보확인이 더욱 편리해지고 강화되었습니다. - 메인로비에서 캐릭터를 터치하면 바로 캐릭터 정보를 확인할 수 있습니다. - 캐릭터 정보에서는 스타플래닛 포인트 및 각종 랭킹 정보를 확인하실 수 있습니다. - 메인로비에서 캐릭터 명 옆의 화살표를 터치하면, 빠르게 보유하고 있는 캐릭터가 표시 됩니다. - 캐릭터 정보확인 창에서 이미지 저장, 다른 앱으로 공유하기, 캐릭터 정보보기 기능 등 편의성이 대폭 향상 되었습니다. 3.“메이플톡” 이 새롭게 탄생 했습니다. 많이 사랑해 주실꺼죠? - 친구와 대화기능을 합쳐 새롭게 “메이플톡” 으로 개선이 되었습니다. - 메이플톡 에서는 모든 월드의 친구를 한눈에 친구목록에서 확인이 가능하며, 친구들과 바로 대화를 시작할 수 있습니다. - 수많은 친구들을 보기 좋게 정렬할 수 있습니다. (월드별, 이름별, 레벨별, 접속별) - 자주 대화하는 친구나 대화방은 즐겨찾기에 등록해서 손쉽게 이동할 수 있습니다. - 많은 용사님들이 제안 주셨던 그룹대화, 길드대화, 친구대화, 길드게시판의 기능이 추가 되었으며, 이는 모두 메이플스토리 온라인과도 연동 됩니다. 단, 길드대화 및 친구대화는 반드시 대표캐릭터가 설정이 되어있어야 하며, 대화방에 입장 하였을 때만 대화를 주고 받을 수 있어요! - 메이플 핸즈 2.0만을 위한 새롭고 귀여운 이모티콘이 개발되었습니다. 친구들과의 대화에서 자유롭게 사용해보세요! 4. 메이플 뉴스 메뉴가 새롭게 개선되었습니다. - 용사님들이 많이 사용하시고 제안 주셨던 뉴스 메뉴로 알차게 구성하였습니다. - 공지사항 / 업데이트 / 이벤트 내용을 바로 확인하실 수 있으며, 직접 홈페이지에 방문하시고 싶으실 경우, 모바일웹 메뉴를 통해 이동이 가능해졌습니다. 5. 캐릭터 정보 업데이트, 친구 동기화 관련 많이 궁금하셨죠? - 새로 친구를 맺은 친구는 자동적으로 한 시간마다 갱신이 됩니다. 만약 바로 친구목록에서 확인을 하고 싶으시다면, 설정- 친구동기화를 통해 가능합니다. 단, 수동 친구 동기화는 한 시간에 한번만 하실 수 있습니다. - 캐릭터 정보 업데이트는 하루에 한번, 새벽 시간대에 이루어 집니다. 캐릭터 정보에는 레벨, 아바타(코디) 가 포함이 되어 있습니다. 앞으로도 메이플 핸즈에서는 용사님들의 의견을 소중히 수렴하고 더욱 유익하고 알찬 기능으로 업데이트하고 찾아뵐것을 약속드릴께요. 많은 관심 부탁 드리겠습니다. 감사합니다! ♠고객센터 바로가기 ☞☞ http://me2.do/Fdc4EooB 전용 고객센터를 통해 게임오류, 게임불편사항 등에 대해서 빠르게 답변이 가능합니다. ♠게임 도움말 바로가기☞☞ http://me2.do/xaLNCCvE ---- 개발자 연락처 : (주)넥슨코리아 경기도 성남시 분당구 판교로 256번길 7 전화: 1588-7701 사업자등록번호: 220-87-17483 통신판매업 신고번호: 제 2013-경기성남-1659 호 통신판매업 신고기관: 성남시 Hello sir warrior! release_text: [2.0.12] - 열혈/냉동용사 테마를 메이플 핸즈에서 제거 하였습니다. [2.0.11] - 업데이트가 비정상적으로 노출이 되는 오류를 수정하였습니다. 불편을 끼쳐드려 죄송합니다. - 이메일ID / 네이버ID 사용 시, 자동 로그인이 풀리는 문제를 수정하였습니다. - 채팅방에서 채팅입력 및 이모티콘 사용 시, 대화창이 최상단으로 이동되는 버그를 수정하였습니다. [2.0.10] - 길드대화방의 정상적 이용이 불가능했던 문제를 재차 수정하였습니다. - 일부 버그가 수정되었습니다. [2.0.9] - 길드대화방이 정상적으로 호출이 안되는 문제를 수정하였습니다. - 일부 버그가 수정되었습니다.

description: A new take on the old Lander game with a Tower Defense twist and vintage feel! Strategically land towers to fight off waves of Martians. Full version features 10 landers, 19 enemy types and 6 unique maps. Keep up with updates and future games at: www.facebook.com/NextWorldEntertainment Feel free to email me at NextWorldEntertainment@Gmail.com with any comments or suggestions.
release_text: (2.1.3) I completely rewrote the physics for the entire game to greatly reduce lag. Most of the scripts have been completely redone and it's brand new so there maybe some minor glitches. If you find any feel free to let me know so I can fix them. You can email me at NextWorldEntertainment@Gmail.com Thank you everyone who has helped so far :)

SAVE THE POPSTAR, SAVE THE WORLD! Help Toshi dance to defeat the evil demons. Save Toshi (for iOS) reached the #7 Top Paid iPhone Puzzle Game in the US and was featured on iTunes under Best Puzzle Games. Over 1 million people have already saved Toshi, giving the game an average rating of 4.5 (out of 5)! This free android version comes with 1 free level pack (20 levels). 4 additional packs can be unlocked for free by using the awesome built in Tapjoy’s offer-wall. PRESS QUOTES (iOS VERSION): “It’s a lovely mix of cute and challenging at a price too good to pass up” Kotaku “2D physics puzzlers like Angry Birds and Cut the Rope dominated the sales charts in 2010, we’re already looking for what’s next, and we think we’ve found it!” SlideToPlay “There is only one flaw to this game, and that is that at some point the game ends.” TouchGen “In short…get this game…play this game…it’s super good!” IPwnGames A NEW DIMENSION TO PUZZLE SOLVING Physics puzzles are definitely one of the most popular game genres on mobile. While most of these puzzles take place in simple 2d worlds, Save Toshi pulls ahead of the competition by providing a unique 3D take on the genre. ME LOVE TO DANCING! Every time mega popstar Toshi dances... a demon dies! This is why the evil demons kidnapped Toshi and made her forget how to walk. Without her supernatural dancing powers the world is in danger! Your mission is to help Toshi get to the dance-floor area by shooting and smashing down the different types of blocks she is standing on. SUPER SIMPLE The intuitive controls that are incredibly simple to pick up. To shoot, tap your finger on the target. To rotate your view, just drag your finger around. Save Toshi has an easy and straightforward learning process with detailed in-game tutorials and there is also a hint system to help players with even with the most challenging levels. SUPER CHALLENGING! The level design uses a wide variety of game-play elements (different materials, explosives, hinges, and more) to create 100 mind-boggling physics puzzles. To get the best score you will need to solve all levels with as few shots as possible. And while the game starts out with extremely easy tutorial puzzles, later levels will really challenge you to think in all 3 dimensions! FEATURE LIST: * Amazingly fluid and realistic 3d physics * 100 fun and challenging levels with a smooth difficulty curve * Outstanding variety of different game-play elements * Intuitive and super easy to pick up controls * Easy and straightforward learning process with in-game tutorials * Hint system available for all levels * Simple stars scoring system (based on number of shots) * Unlock levels for free using Tapjoy’s offerwall * Cute and hilarious lead anime character * HD quality 3D graphics * Unlock new outfits, music & environments We believe in an ongoing conversation with our players, so please let us know what you think about Save Toshi! follow us on facebook or subscribe to our mailing list on our website to get FREE bonus content alerts in the future. -------------------------------------------------------- Website: http://www.nitako.com Twitter: http://twitter.com/nitako Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/user/noamabta Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/home.php?#/profile.php?id=698460871&ref=profile iTunes
release_text: Updated support for newer devices Ads removed Performance boost Crash fixes on some devices

description: Скоро обновление 1.6 Обновление 1.5: 1)Немного перерисованы кнопки, немного изменён цвет фона 2)Люди в вашей команде теперь сохраняются 3)Название вашей компании сохраняется Обновление 1.4: 1)Новый интерфейс 2)Возможность создать свою компанию Срочное дополнение к обновлению 1.3 1)Убрано закрытие приложения 2)Исправлен магазин 3)Исправлен последний баг с возможностью изменения надписей Обновление 1.3: 1)Исправлен баг с возможностью изменения надписей 2)Количество нанятых людей теперь сохраняется 3)Если вы свернёте игру что бы взломать её, то вам придётся её перезапустить. P.S. Игра вошла в топ бесплатных игр в России Обновление 1.2: 1)Небольшие изменения надписей на кнопках 2)Появилась возможность смотреть чем вы владеете 3)Теперь можно покупать квартиры и машины (По просьбам игроков) Обновление 1.1: 1)Изменён интерфейс 2)Убран пункт еды (По просьбам игроков) 3)Теперь вы можете нанимать в команду не 10, а 20 человек (По просьбам игроков) 4)Появилась кнопка новая игра (По просьбам игроков) Как тяжело в наше время программистам. Не каждый быстро начинает зарабатывать большие деньги. Ваша задача придти к материальному успеху. Создавай разные проекты или покупай готовые, нанимай людей в команду, развивай свой бизнес, получай за свои проекты доход. Ходи в магазин что бы восполнить свою энергию. Ну что, ты готов стать успешным программистом? Тогда вперёд! Soon update 1.6 Update 1.5: 1) A little redrawn buttons slightly changed the background color 2) The people on your team are now saved 3) The name of your company saved Update 1.4: 1) The new interface 2) Ability to create your company Urgent addition to updating 1.3 1) Removed closing applications 2) Fixed shop 3) Fixed a bug with the last opportunity to change the labels Update 1.3: 1) Fixed a bug with the ability to change the labels 2) The number of employed people now saved 3) If you will roll a game that would hack it, you have to restart it. P.S. The game entered the top free games in Russia Update 1.2: 1) Small changes labels on the buttons 2) Now you can watch what you own 3) Now you can buy an apartment and car (At the request of players) Update 1.1: 1) Changed interface 2) Removed the food item (At the request of players) 3) Now you can hire a team not 10, but 20 people (at the request of players) 4) The button appears a new game (At the request of players) How hard nowadays programmers. Not everyone quickly begins to make a lot of money. Your task is to come to material success. Create different projects or to buy ready, hire people to the team, develop the business, getting their projects revenue. Go to a store that would make up their energy. Well, are you ready to become a successful programmer? Then go ahead!

description: Facebook application is needed to use this app. This application is simply a shortcut to launch the Facebook Lockscreen without the need of Facebook Home. Follow Facebook's onscreen tuturial to set the Facebook lockscreen to your device, clear Facebooks app data in the android settings to revert back to your stock lockscreen. Not much to say about this application 8) Does what it does. You may remove this application after setting the Facebook Lockscreen on your device as this app isnt needed further after the action. All Rights Reserved to Facebook

description: This crazy bird is clumsy! In the open air there is only who can survive…the clumsy duck. He goes out on his mission to collect lost treasure, grab power-ups, and flap through the skies. Try and complete the challenges as you flap. Collect coins to use for free power-ups so that you can set the high score! Good luck and happy flapping!

description: Take your goat on a run through the city! He is on a rampage! Explore the city on a run with the crazy goat! Run, jump and move around obstacles. Collect coins and power ups along the way to get the high score. FEATURES: - Goat smash! - Easy running gameplay - Challenging for all ages Get started with the crazy goat today!
